programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Winter is fast approaching, and moose-hunting season begins. Tyler stalks an elusive bull, while Charlie gets a taste of why the region is known as starvation country.

programme.title: Extinct Or Alive
programme.desc: Madagascars Pachylemurs were red, furry giants, nearly the size of great apes. Forrest scales the jungle canopy to prove the giant species still lives.

programme.title: Bad Dog
programme.desc: A dog wont stop chasing an ice-cream truck until she gets an ice lolly, and a cat steals food and destroys the house. Plus a rabbit keeps wreaking havoc in the fridge.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Wolfpack seizes an opportunity to stockpile meat with their first-ever buffalo hunt. Brothers Noah and Bam are left to build a mine-cooled meat locker and keep the ranch running in anticipation of the familys return.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: As new predators encroach on the ranch, the Browns devise inventive solutions to defend their livestock. Gabes long-distance girlfriend makes her first visit.

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The boys head to Mexico in a bid to catch a tarpon, which is known to be one the world’s greatest sportsfish. In order to catch these creatures they must navigate through a maze of crocodile and mosquito infested waterways.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: As baby Grace discovers the world, Robert and the team attempt the biggest Gator move in Australia Zoo history. Meanwhile, Terri helps the Sumatran Elephants.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: The Zoos huge male sea lion is in rut, and staff need to move the younger males before he comes territorial. The veterinary team come up with an ingenious solution to repair Dinky the Flamingos broken ankle. And feeding a rock python proves challenging.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: After a year in the making, the Barn Sanctuary pigs are ready to move in to their pig palace. The turkeys are gifted with musical instruments, and after Andy the cow passes, the staff has a memorial in his honor.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff discovers a large mass on a loveable canine. Vet tech Kelly treats her dogs sun-damaged nose, and Dr. Baier and Hector join forces to treat wild bison.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Businessman Brad Jennings wants to complete his new office with three tanks. The guys work on three complementary interiors which include a working fireplace!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Investigators brave alligator-infested waters to help save an injured alligator. Meanwhile, 400 farm animals are rescued in Miamis biggest ever seizure!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: A dramatic rescue to save a manatees flipper uncovers a secret. Meanwhile, Investigator Casadevall is hunting for poachers whove left several cattle dead.

programme.desc: The Raneys put their ingenuity to the test on a homestead in Hawaii that was destroyed by a massive lava flow. First, they must bring life back to the property.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A tomistoma, a freshwater crocodilian, stops laying eggs and a team of keepers scrambles to treat her. The veterinary team has to rescue a baby antelope that isnt getting the care it needs from its mother. And Mert the Goose takes a field trip.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: Dan races to North Carolina to rescue a group of pigs from horrific living conditions and discovers that one of the pigs is pregnant. Later, the organization’s new sign is displayed, making their transformation official.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: When a black lab swallows some toxic metal, Dr. Jeff races to save his life. Then, a cat suddenly returns home after a year and a half with a mysterious injury, and a tiny dog has a big life-threatening problem.

programme.desc: World champion boxer, Fernando Vargas, asks ATM to make a boxing glove-shaped tank for his boxing gym in Las Vegas. Can they deliver a knockout?

programme.desc: Investigators are determined to get justice for a neglected dog and her puppy. Plus, Investigator Casadevall rushes to help some dogs suffering in the Miami heat.

programme.desc: An emotional case lies in store for Houston SPCAs animal cruelty investigators when they find a puppy that has been badly beaten and has 13 broken bones.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Deep in the wilds of Louisiana, a crab fisherman is caught stealing traps and a hunter is caught with an illegal deer. Plus, agents rescue an injured eagle.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: Bradley and Billy are in the Mojave Desert, California, to find the bombardier beetle. When attacked or agitated, it releases a hot, noxious chemical spray.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: In the Madagascan rainforest, the team search for a nearly invisible creature: the panther chameleon. When tested, the reptile seems to defy the laws of physics.

programme.desc: When Grace VanderWaal, a singer, songwriter, and ukulele marvel won Americas Got Talent, she said she wanted a "sick" treehouse, and Pete heard her loud and clear.

programme.title: Louisiana Law

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits the UKs largest sports shoe factory to see how 3,500 pairs of trainers are made every day, before meeting the man who comes up with the latest designs. Cherry Healey gets hands-on in a tannery, helping to process thousands of rawhides into finished leather for the nations shoes, and finds out how a ballet company painstakingly create 250,000 ballet shoes per year. Ruth Goodman reveals how, when the sewing machine was first introduced into shoe factories in the mid-19th century, traditional shoemakers went on strike to rebel against joining a restrictive production line

programme.title: Asia

Edward sees the commotion and orders Sid and Father Brown off the property.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Concluding part of the case involving a professor whose internet dating video is leaked onto a website and watched by her students.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Adjusting to his new surroundings as police chief of Saint-Marie, DI Richard Poole searches the island for a decent cup of tea while investigating the strange murder of a bride who was killed with a spear gun.

programme.title: War and Peace
programme.desc: After months of waiting, Natasha is frustrated to learn that her wedding to Andrei may be delayed further. She tries to make a good impression on her new father and sister-in-law.

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Mark suffers a tragic personal loss and is given the chance to leave prison for a day, while Eric is forced to take greater risks to protect his family

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Mervin is about to fly home but finds himself at the center of a murder investigation when a body is discovered in his shack. As Mervin professes his innocence, the team can’t work out how the victim ended up inside a locked building with no sign of forced entry. The womans identity remains elusive until they discover she was volunteering at a local turtle conservation charity, and suspicion falls on her colleagues. Meanwhile, Selwyn grapples with his most difficult decision yet, and he delivers some personal news to Mervin that turns everything on its head.

programme.title: Six Four
programme.desc: An unexpected visitor confronts Chris with the consequences of Michelles secrets. A visit to Gary McLeans killer brings Chris closer to the truth and Annabel faces her captor.

programme.title: Shakespeare and Hathaway: Private Investigators
programme.desc: A carpet magnate is killed in an accident at his warehouse, but his youngest daughter suspects foul play and hires Frank and Luella to investigate her own two sisters.

programme.title: War and Peace
programme.desc: After months of waiting, Natasha is frustrated to learn that her wedding to Andrei may be delayed further. She tries to make a good impression on her new father and sister-in-law.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Patsy helps experienced mother Rhoda Mullucks give birth, but when the baby has severe deformities Ruth rejects the new-born and the father struggles to cope with the situation.

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: First episode of the comedy following two brothers who visit their parents once a week for dinner, but have to put up with their familys many eccentricities. Jonny Goodmans father asks him to stash some magazines at his flat following a clear-out of the house, and a sofa bed gets stuck on the stairs, splitting the relatives between the ground and first floors. Guest starring Mark Heap, with Simon Bird, Tom Rosenthal, Tamsin Greig and Paul Ritter

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: The Roman Catholic priest sets out to protect an old friend by investigating a 300-year-old secret hidden in a university. Fifties-set crime drama, starring Mark Williams

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: A professor is humiliated when her internet dating video is leaked onto a website and watched by her students. The next morning she is found dead, the victim of what appears to be a straightforward suicide.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: When a skydiver appears to have been murdered in mid-air, Neville and the team must explore the cut-throat world of social media. Caribbean detective drama, starring Ralf Little, Josephine Jobert and Don Warrington

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Barbara treats a pregnant woman whose dockworker husband is struggling to support her as opportunities for work dry up. She is forced into a difficult decision that leaves Barbara facing the biggest test of her career. Nurse Crane meets a kindred spirit when she learns to speak Spanish, and Sister Evangelina helps a woman with breastfeeding, leading to unforeseen consequences

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Its Christmas, and Alison and Mike are hosting his family. They are determined to deliver the best Christmas ever for the living and the dead, although the latter arent filled with festive cheer. (Final)

programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Grizzy decides to get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable, but the shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day!

programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: Moley

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: When a cell phone falls into Roley Poley park from the Great Above, the entire town is mesmerized by it and Moley must break the “spell” it has on them.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: When Moley is given the key to the city, he has such a great day he convinces Manny to let him repeat the whole day! But when the day never stops repeating, Moley needs to find a way out.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated

Meanwhile, in present day, a totally different evil Fred mirrors every move with our gang... looking for the same Planispheric Disc.

programme.desc: Scooby and the gang are called to investigate a mysterious phantom who is robbing the towns bank vaults at night by walking through its walls.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?

But soon, they all find themselves embroiled in a crazy mystery involving spooky mudmen, the lost ruins of an ancient civilization and a treasure of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Just like every year for Halloween Fred refuses to leave the house. He believes that no mysteries will be solved on that day and that nothing will go as planned.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen rondom een spookachtige artiest die ronddwaalt in haar voormalige concerthal, moet de gang doen alsof ze een rockband zijn! Maar kunnen ze de zaak oplossen voor dat Velma het podium op moet en moet zingen?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: If You Cant Scooby-Doo the Time Dont Scooby-Doo the Crime

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: When Scooby and Shaggy compete in a Fast Food eating competition sponsored by the Doc Tally restaurant chain, they meet their ultimate challenge eating against none other than comedian JIM GAFFIGAN – the only one who might love bacon more than they do! Oh yeah, and there’s also a horrible monster trying to stop the whole contest from finishing. Can Shaggy, Scooby and our mystery solving gang team up with Jim Gaffigan to save the fast food competition...and themselves?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: When Neil deGrasse Tyson gets trapped on the International Space Station with a horrible monster Bill Nye arrives to save his good friend with the help of Velma and our mystery solving gang. Arriving at the space station in the nick of time our heroes work with these two scientific minds to separate the science from the science fiction when a Tardigrade monster wreaks havoc on the ship.

programme.title: Whats New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The ghost of a wrestling-move-gone-wrong terrifies the opening of a new wrestling facility.

programme.title: Whats New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang goes to Paris to see Daphnes cousin become Model of the Year, but when they get there, they find shes been abducted by a giant gargoyle.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Just like every year for Halloween Fred refuses to leave the house. He believes that no mysteries will be solved on that day and that nothing will go as planned.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: On a trip to Japan to visit Velmas friend, the gang comes face to face with the ancient crab monster, Kaniaku, and attempts to solve a 700 year-old mystery. Meanwhile, Daphne accidentally becomes a viral media sensation in Japan!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Internet on Haunted House Hill!
programme.desc: When Shaggy and Scooby meet up with their good friend Liza Koshy at an old haunted mansion, they find themselves the subject of her many fast-paced internet videos and at the center of a horrifying ghost attack! Luckily, the rest of our mystery solving teens are along for the ride and jump into action to get to the bottom of this ghostly enigma. Can they unravel whats really going on in this spooky old house? Or will they be part of the last video Liza Koshy ever makes?! And if so, will it go viral?! Smash that LIKE and SUBSCRIBE button to find out...

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Dreaded Remake of Jekyll and Hyde!
programme.desc: Scooby and our mystery solving gang are on set with famous singer, dancer, comedian and actress Sandy Duncan.

programme.title: Whats New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Big Scare in the Big Easy

programme.sub-title: Its Mean, Its Green, Its The Mystery Machine

programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.desc: Chaos is all part of the fun for Scooby-Doo and the crew, in these best adventures!

programme.desc: Traveling through the underground caverns, our heroes trail Pericles and company. programme.desc: Driving through the Rocky Mountains, the Mystery Inc. gang discovers a sleep-away accordion camp run by none other than WEIRD AL YANKOVIC! programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om een sneeuwstorm te ontwijken checkt de groep in bij een eng enorm hotel wat geleid wordt door een man die erg strikt is over de regels die opgesteld zijn door zijn overleden moeder. De groep komt erachter dat de straf voor een overtreding uitgevoerd wordt door de geest van de overleden moeder zelf.

programme.title: Scooby Doo, Where Are You!
programme.sub-title: What The Hex Is Going On?
programme.desc: The gang visits the Weatherby estate to investigate.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: A pair of brutal GARGANTUAS begin breaking apart the town, which sadly mirrors the fractured relationship of MYSTERY INC. See, while searching for Shaggy, Scooby accidentally discovers him KANOODLING WITH VELMA. Feeling betrayed, Scooby is inconsolable, despite the best efforts of Fred and Daphne to cheer him up and put the team back together. Although they ultimately reunite to capture and defeat the Humongonauts, the rift in the gang is deep, and the question by the end of the episode soon becomes... can Mystery Inc. ever be healed again?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: In the Service of His Majesty
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. Hup! One button and theres light! Hup! Another surveys the houses nooks and crannies. Grizzy will finally be able to rid himself of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch! But beware of losing control...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks hes a rodent! He tries to get the gang to adopt him so that he might participate in their fun and games like any other Lemming. But its not long before his newfound comrades start to find him rather heavy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: A motorcycle-riding robber known as the Dandy Highwayman is kidnapping all the women of Crystal Cove, and now its up to our heroes to put a stop to his rogue ways. programme.title: Scooby Doo, Where Are You!

programme.title: Whats New, Scooby-Doo?

programme.desc: Shaggy competes in a mini golf tournament that is terrorized by a giant metallic clown.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best of Shaggy
programme.desc: Catch the best Shaggy episodes in these thrilling adventures. From mystery-solving to ghost-hunting, theres no quest too tricky for the gang!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Driving outside Shreveport, Louisiana, our gang of mystery solvers is run off the road by a shooting star that crashes down in the middle of the large ranch belonging to none-other than famous football hall of famer and TV sports host, Terry Bradshaw! Upon further investigation, the "shooting star" turns out to be a spaceship unleashing an alien monster on the local countryside! The gang and Mr. Bradshaw work together to get to the bottom of this space alien mystery and figure out what this alien is really after: championship rings or giant donuts.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes to Salem, Massachusetts, for the historical festival, only to discover history repeating itself as a demon has been set loose on the town, supposedly summoned by a witch as revenge for the infamous 17th-century Salem witch trials.

programme.title: Whats New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: Daphne takes the gang to Africa to document the disappearing animals in the wild. However, they come across a demon who tries to scare them away.

programme.sub-title: She Sees Sea Monsters At The Sea Shore
programme.desc: The gang head to an island to relax at Mr. Blakes time-share condo when they encounter a sea serpent spirit. It seems that when it feels the island is threatened by visitors, the spirit takes revenge by sinking their boats.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

Het probleem: Fred is onmiddellijk jaloers op de nieuwe vent en wil het mysterie oplossen voordat Jeff de kans krijgt, met de hulp van de kinderen uit de tourgroep van Jeff.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De favoriete chef van Shaggy en Scooby opent eindelijk zijn eigen restaurant maar een monsterlijke yeti bedreigt de openingsavond. Or will the ghostly doppelganger catch them instead?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Addestrando allenando

programme.title: Efficace scorcatoia / Intricati Forteti 1a parte
programme.desc: Caccia di selezione invernale a un maschio di daino adulto sugli Appennini Reggiani. / Movimentata caccia a un grande cinghiale.

programme.title: La ricarica a pallini
programme.desc: Realizzazione di una cartuccia in calibro .410 con relativa misurazione al banco di prova e prova di rosata.

programme.title: A caccia nel Sud
programme.desc: Dal Salento ci si sposta sul Gargano, per andare a caccia di colombacci con antonio Calvano, cacciatore e pescatore oltre che fotografo naturalista.

programme.title: Falchi e falconieri
programme.desc: Ep. 2 - Osserviamo lintroduzione dei rapaci alla caccia allinizio della stagione con Agostino Pasquariello, presidente dellUnione Nazionale Cacciatori Falconieri, Ivano Avonmi e Pio Meglioli.

programme.title: Il punto sulla selezione in italia
programme.desc: Ep. 5 La Toscana - Non si poteva non tornare nella regione da dove tutto e partito, e cioe da dove e iniziata la gestione selettiva degli ungulati cosi come oggi la conosciamo: la Toscana.

programme.title: Close up - Speciale caccia
programme.desc: Ep. 1 Alla scoperta dei parassiti - La versione per Caccia tv del programma di Antonio Varcasia parlera di parassiti e zoonosi, le infezioni che possono essere trasmesse dagli animali alluomo.

programme.title: Speciale acquatici
programme.desc: Ep. 4 Anatre ed oche in Romania - Lultimo episodio di Speciale acquatici e il racconto di tre giorni di caccia ad anatre ed oche in Romania, ospiti di Frank Romano.

programme.title: Fucili da collezione
programme.desc: Ep. 1 - Scopriamo quali sono i fucili da collezione, la loro storia e i racconti di caccia ai quali sono legati; poi le scuole di costruzione italiane le armi fini di scuola inglese.

programme.title: Sognando la Namibia
programme.sub-title: Alla scoperta di un mondo nuovo
programme.desc: Carlo e un cacciatore che ha scelto la Namibia per la sua prima esperienza di caccia a palla. A guidarlo, il professional hunter Luciano Proietti.

programme.title: A caccia in Europa
programme.desc: Le magnifiche montagne abruzzesi sono lo sfondo a due giornate di caccia coi cani da ferma, perfette per testare due fucili Browning: il B525 e il Maxsus 2.

programme.title: La ricarica a pallini
programme.desc: Realizzazione di una cartuccia in calibro .410 con relativa misurazione al banco di prova e prova di rosata.

programme.title: Larte dei fischi
programme.desc: Un documentario dedicato al fascino dei richiami a fiato: lartigiano Stefano Penazza fa da guida in un viaggio dallinterno del laboratorio al terreno di caccia.

programme.title: Colombaccio a tutto tondo
programme.desc: Nella puntata odierna: caratteristiche morfologiche, abitudini ed allevamento del colombaccio, bibliografia fondamentale e descrizione delle specie congeneri quali colombelle e tortore.

programme.title: Gli specialisti del daino
programme.desc: Ep. 1 Intruders - Ottobre, periodo degli accoppiamenti e della formazione di lek con incontri amorosi e combattimenti tra maschi: seguiamo tre azioni di caccia al daino al bramito.

programme.title: Fucili da collezione
programme.desc: Ep. 1 - Scopriamo quali sono i fucili da collezione, la loro storia e i racconti di caccia ai quali sono legati; poi le scuole di costruzione italiane le armi fini di scuola inglese.

programme.title: Ep
programme.desc: Miniserie che racconta lesperienza di diversi cacciatori in Namibia. Ogni cacciatore raccontera la sua Africa, cercando di trasmettere lemozione di unavventura cosi diversa dalle solite.

programme.title: Hunting Time 11
programme.desc: Tornano per lundicesima edizione le avventure itineranti di caccia di Alessandro Alessandri e del suo team, di cui fanno parte e sono anzi protagonisti i loro bellissimi setter.

programme.title: Cinghialai dItalia 12
programme.desc: Docicesimo anno per la serie dedicata alla caccia al cinghiale in braccata, che conferma il suo stile ormai classico ma propone anche diverse novita.

programme.title: TG5
programme.desc: Le notizie piu importanti nazionali e internazionali, con approfondimenti e rubriche, a cura della redazione giornalistica di Canale 5.

programme.title: Un ciclone in famiglia
programme.desc: Mentre Alberto e Peppino si dedicano a ricostruire villa Fumagalli dopo le devastazioni dei Black Satana, Lorenzo accorre al capezzale di uno zio morente, dal quale apprende un segreto.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Ventura cerca di riportare Angel dalla sua parte facendogli unofferta. Carmen nel frattempo e molto impegnata con la cerimonia che sta organizzando per presentare la candidatura di Francisco come presidente del circolo Imprenditori. Carmen e convinta che Patricia stia tramando qualcosa e limprovviso appoggio della donna alla candidatura di Francisco non la convince, Patricia tenta di dimostrarle che si sta sbagliando. Prendendo il telefono di sua madre Julia scopre che Diana si e iscritta ad una chat di incontri e che sta chattando con un uomo di nome Antonio.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Dopo il furto a casa di Mauro e Germana, la coppia si trasferisce a casa di Roberto, riducendo notevolmente la sua privacy con Francesca. Ma non ce tempo per le lamentele personali: gli agenti devono occuparsi di una ragazza ferita da un anonimo che le ha sparato da lontano. Potrebbe trattarsi di un tiratore scelto.. Intanto Ugo e Vittoria risolvono il caso di una professoressa vittima di telefonate anonime oscene. Intanto, fra Ingargiola e Vittoria accade qualcosa che non si sarebbero mai aspettati.

programme.title: Grande Fratello
programme.desc: I partecipanti, reclusi nella casa, concorrono per il montepremi finale di 100.000 euro. Al centro del racconto del reality le loro storie.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: Il conflitto tra Li e Poppy si inasprisce. Li accusa Poppy di essere una cacciatrice di dote e una cattiva madre. Critica il suo stile di vita e laccusa di usare sostanze stupefacenti come le sue "mentine speciali". Li teme che Poppy non stia dando un buon esempio a Luna e che le sue abitudini possano portare la figlia sulla strada della droga. Poppy si difende, sostenendo di essere una donna adulta e che le sue scelte non danneggiano ne se stessa ne sua figlia. Accusa Li di giudicarla costantemente e di imporre standard rigidi a tutti. Luna (Lisa Yamada) torna a casa dalla madre sconvolta dopo essersi svegliata nel letto di Zende (Delon De Metz), dopo aver fatto lamore con lui convinta di essere insieme a R.J. (Joshua Hoffman), il suo fidanzato. Quindi confessa a Poppy (Romy Parks) di non ricordare chiaramente che cosa sia successo e di sentirsi molto confusa e di provare dei sensi di colpa, poiche ama con tutto il cuore R.J. e non lo tradirebbe mai volontariamente.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: I sentimenti tra Alihan e Zeynep, nonostante il matrimonio di lui con Ender, restano forti e contrastanti. Durante una cena, la tensione esplode: Ender li affronta pubblicamente, portando a una situazione carica di imbarazzo. Il matrimonio tra Ender e Alihan e solo di facciata, ma Ender pretende di mantenere le apparenze e minaccia Alihan quando lo scopre con Zeynep. Tuttavia, Alihan non ha intenzione di rinunciare a lei e mette Ender di fronte a una dura realta: non si pieghera alle sue regole.

programme.title: Uomini E Donne
programme.desc: Il dating show che racconta lamore in chiave contemporanea, tra tronisti giovani e partecipanti over che cercano la loro anima gemella.

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: Enver e le altre donne raccontano a Bahar tutto quello che e successo e il motivo per cui le hanno tenuto nascosto del ritorno di Sarp, sperando che lei potesse perdonarli, ma Bahar, profondamente delusa, dice loro di non volerli piu vedere. Intanto, Sarp chiede aiuto a Munir per proteggere Bahar e i bambini dagli uomini di Nezir che li stanno sorvegliando, poi confessa a Piril che Sirin lo tiene in pugno perche e in possesso di foto compromettenti. Ceyda ha un colloquio con Jale e la donna le offre una possibilita come baby-sitter di Bora. Sirin mette, per dispetto, i piatti sporchi nello spazio in cucina dove prima cera la lavastoviglie, mandando Enver su tutte le furie. Infine, Arif ha uno scontro con Yusuf perche ha venduto lanello di sua madre che aveva regalato a Bahar.

programme.title: Amici di Maria de Filippi
programme.desc: Lappuntamento quotidiano con i ragazzi di Amici!

programme.title: Dentro La Notizia
programme.desc: Il nuovo programma pomeridiano dinformazione condotto da Gianluigi Nuzzi con approfondimenti su storie, fatti e attualita.

programme.title: Grande Fratello
programme.desc: I partecipanti, reclusi nella casa, concorrono per il montepremi finale di 100.000 euro. Al centro del racconto del reality le loro storie.

programme.title: La ruota della fortuna
programme.desc: Gerry Scotti e al timone dello storico game show, affiancato da Samira. La tradizione incontra linnovazione con tante novita come la Ruota delle Meraviglie e premi da sogno!

programme.title: Grande Fratello

programme.title: Uomini E Donne
programme.desc: Il dating show che racconta lamore in chiave contemporanea, tra tronisti giovani e partecipanti over che cercano la loro anima gemella.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Dopo una conversazione piena di intenzioni, Julia e Tirso decidono di iniziare una nuova tappa della loro vita, e non saranno gli unici ad avere quellobiettivo a Robledillo. Diana, nonostante la paura, da una possibilita alla sua relazione virtuale con Antonio sotto consiglio della figlia. Mario si apre con Erik, raccontandogli di un periodo molto doloroso della sua storia familiare. Intanto, Dani e Chloe hanno fatto pace, ma lui non ha ancora confessato di essere lo stesso "Dani" di cui Chloe si e innamorata. Dani ha intenzione di parlare con Ribero prima della sua partenza per Berlino. Erik confessa che ha ripreso ad avere un bel rapporto con sua madre. A Rio Muni, una Carmen confusa vuole credere che Victor sia libero da qualsiasi colpa per il fallimento della candidatura di Francisco. Nonostante Victor si mostri sincero e chieda solo fiducia, Carmen non puo dimenticare che e figlio di don Ventura.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Julia si confessa con Elena e ammette di non capire bene il comportamento di Tirso: dice di provare un sentimento molto forte per lei, ma non ha avuto problemi a riprendere la sua relazione con Olga. Diana e combattuta perche non e sicura di voler incontrare Antonio, luomo che ha conosciuto on-line. Ha paura di esporsi al fallimento, ma accettare di avere un appuntamento con lui le da anche a una speranza di felicita. Erik sorprende Tirso e Olga insieme, chiedendo loro perdono e accettando, a modo suo, il loro rapporto damore. I due sono felicissimi di questo cambiamento nellatteggiamento del ragazzo. Leo cerco di parlare con Julia, ma Diana cerca di impedirglielo. A Rio Muni, Carmen e pronta a lottare e vuole che suo padre don Francisco non ceda allinfluenza di Patricia e che mantenga la sua candidatura alla presidenza del Circolo Imprenditori nonostante gli ostacoli. Angel e Ines scoprono finalmente dove si trova il tenente Ibanez.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Julia riceve la visita di Leo, intenzionato a guadagnarsi il suo perdono dopo essere riuscito a far ritirare gli articoli dal giornale. Leo promette che non ci saranno piu articoli su di lei: ha restituito tutti i soldi guadagnati con quegli articoli e devoluto i proventi delle pubblicita sul sito a Sebas. Tuttavia Julia, ancora ferita per essere stata ingannata, non si sente ancora pronta ad accettare le sue scuse. Intanto Tirso fa visita a suo fratello in carcere per metterlo al corrente della sua relazione con Olga, ma la sua reazione e cosi inaspettata che lalbergatore ha paura di dire la verita a Erik. A Rio Muni, Carmen riflette sulla risposta da dare a Victor riguardo i suoi sentimenti, finche il ragazzo la sorprende con una proposta allettante. Questa proposta inaspettata le fara riconsiderare il suo futuro in Guinea, con grande tristezza di Kiros. Intanto, Ines e Angel continuano a collaborare per scoprire tutta la verita sullomicidio di Alicia.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Mauro e Roberto corrono a fermare un uomo che sta platealmente per spararsi in strada. Giulia continua, nel frattempo, ad indagare sulla morte di Paolo, sulla base di alcune foto fatte esaminare dalla scientifica.

programme.title: Grande Fratello
programme.desc: I partecipanti, reclusi nella casa, concorrono per il montepremi finale di 100.000 euro. Al centro del racconto del reality le loro storie.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: R.J. si confida con sua madre Brooke (Katherine Kelly Lang), preoccupato per latteggiamento insolito di Luna, ma completamente ignaro di quello che e realmente accaduto. Zende, anchegli piuttosto turbato, rievoca quello che e accaduto e cerca conforto e sostegno nel nonno Eric (John McCook) che e passato a trovarlo e che tra le altre cose gli parla proprio di Luna chiedendogli di farle da mentore nel lungo periodo in cui lui sara assente per la convalescenza. Intanto a casa Nozawa la verita emerge gradualmente: Luna ricorda di essersi sentita stranamente stanca alla festa e di essere entrata in una delle dependance per prendere dellacqua, e poi di essersi addormentata. Rievoca pero unimmagine vivida di R.J., nonostante fosse in realta con Zende.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: Yildiz, ormai esasperata dalla sua vita con Halit, prende una decisione drastica: fa le valigie e se ne va via di casa. Si dirige da Kemal, determinata a confessargli i suoi sentimenti, ma con sua grande sorpresa scopre che in quel momento e in corso il matrimonio tra Kemal e Zehra. Proprio mentre gli sposi stanno per pronunciare il fatidico "si", la cerimonia viene bruscamente interrotta da una telefonata: Erim ha avuto un incidente e ha investito una donna, che sembra essere morta. Il panico si diffonde rapidamente tra i membri della famiglia.

programme.title: Uomini E Donne
programme.desc: Il dating show che racconta lamore in chiave contemporanea, tra tronisti giovani e partecipanti over che cercano la loro anima gemella.

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: Enver e le altre donne raccontano a Bahar tutto quello che e successo e il motivo per cui le hanno tenuto nascosto del ritorno di Sarp, sperando che lei potesse perdonarli, ma Bahar, profondamente delusa, dice loro di non volerli piu vedere. Intanto, Sarp chiede aiuto a Munir per proteggere Bahar e i bambini dagli uomini di Nezir che li stanno sorvegliando, poi confessa a Piril che Sirin lo tiene in pugno perche e in possesso di foto compromettenti. Ceyda ha un colloquio con Jale e la donna le offre una possibilita come baby-sitter di Bora. Sirin mette, per dispetto, i piatti sporchi nello spazio in cucina dove prima cera la lavastoviglie, mandando Enver su tutte le furie. Infine, Arif ha uno scontro con Yusuf perche ha venduto lanello di sua madre che aveva regalato a Bahar.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Oracle / The Safety / The Saint / The Friend / The Spoiler / The Society / The Countdown
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe’s mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Things aren’t going Gumball’s way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so it’s up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Egg / The Downer / The Money / The Triangle / The Third
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood. / Richard has lost all of the family’s money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Gumball and Darwin spice up their friendship by introducing a third best friend... / Gumball has to save Mr Robinson’s life during Elmore’s Senior Talent Show!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Painting / The Pressure / The Responsible / The Dress / The Laziest / The Ghost / The Prank / The Mystery
programme.desc: Principal Brown tries to “fix” Gumball’s dysfunctional family. / Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl. / Gumball and Darwin babysit Anais “responsibly” whilst “irresponsibly” flooding the house. / Gumball goes to school in a dress and becomes the darling of Elmore High. / Gumball and Darwin challenge Dad to a “lazy-off”. / Gumball must learn to say “no” when Carrie the Ghost uses his body against his will. / Gumball and Darwin’s harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwin’s martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero.

Nothing is impossible for our heroes! / Hockey is a game for the most courageous strong and dexterous! Its much more interesting to go on a fun adventure with new friends.

Masha is no exception. / Everyone has their own favorite food. Our friends are ready to enjoy something delicious in the new episode. Can a treat be tasty and healthy at the same time? / When we crave for adventures and new experiences, we take sleeping bags and a tent and go camping. We will admire amazing landscapes, climb a mountain and even see real volcanoes! / What is inside such seemingly simple objects surrounding us? How are the mechanisms that we use every day arranged? Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible / Masha wants to play hide and seek. But the Bear has other plans in mind. Knowing that it is impossible to go against her wishes he agrees to play with her. / It is raining cats and dogs outside and the Bear is going to read a book. He is sure that Masha will stay home but she soon shows up on his doorstep and also wants to read. / Masha has the hiccups! The Bear tries remedies from a medical encyclopaedia to stop the hiccups. In the end they spread to the other forest inhabitants. / Masha finds a magical hat that grants gifts to all the forest dwellers. / The Bear is tired of being an eternal nanny for Masha and Panda who have ruined the entire house! He decides to get some rest and hires a special nanny for the little ‘angels’…

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Runaway Train / Runaway Horse / Run Norman Run / Rocky Rescue
programme.desc: When Bronwyn gives her father Gareth Griffiths a sausage sandwich for his lunch she has no idea the lengths Nipper the dog will go to for a bite! / Sam and the crew arrive at Lizzie’s Vet Surgery to find that Woolly is stuck on the roof! / When the PA system blows out and sparks a fire at the Pontypandy Fun Run, it’s all hands-on deck to stop the spreading flames! / Sarah, James and Lily are out with their parents and Trevor is being guided along Pontypandy Mountain by Moose. / After exploring a sea cave by kayak, Jodie and Hannah realize the boat they arrived on has been pulled out to sea in a riptide. They’re stranded!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Extreme Dominos / Surprise Deglaciation / Thermal Lemmings / Substitute Egg / Lemmings Constellation / Spinning Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. / The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. / By chance, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks. / In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. / The Lemmings open a nightclub. / The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. / Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize.

programme.title: One More Game / Nature Chat / Missing Mel
programme.desc: Barney helps David see the value of balancing video games with physical play. / Barney shows Mel the importance of not just respecting nature, but also being a caretaker of it. / When Mel breaks her arm, she’s away from the park while she recovers and her friends do something nice to show her how much they missed her. / Mel makes a big mess in the park and learns its important to care for shared spaces.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: Grandfather Clock / The New Dress / A Day In Bed
programme.desc: Mr Bean breaks Mrs Wicket’s antique grandfather clock and has to get it repaired before she notices! / Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean decides to stay in bed all day – even when making his breakfast, brushing his teeth and ordering a pizza! / Mr Paliwal has a new electric go-kart and challenges Mr Bean to a race – so he has to build one from scratch!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: Opera Bean / Taxi Bean / Muscle Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up on stage at the opera house...in a dress! / Mr Bean becomes a taxi driver after being locked in a taxi. / Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great. / Mr Bean’s hobby goes down in flames in his battle for air supremacy. / During a visit to Buckingham Palace Mr Bean meets the lady of the house. / Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: A Car for Irma / Trophy Bean / Game Over
programme.desc: Bean is unimpressed with Declans new SUV. / Mrs. Wicket ropes in Bean to look after her nephew. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Red Hot Chilli Nibbles / Record Breakers / Radio Mandy / Poorly Penny
programme.desc: Its Malcolms first day in Pontypandy, but Bronwyns welcome party nibbles turn out a bit too fiery for everyones tastes. / Station Officer Steele gets dancing lessons from the firefighters so that he could go to the Firefighters Gala. / A made-up traffic report creates a real traffic problem, so when an emergency call comes, the Fire Team and Police Horse Kilo must go cross-country! / On Fireman Sams day off the crew are inundated with the Jones emergencies. Firefighter Penny Morris has caught a cold but she still tries to perform her firefighter duties. / Norman Mandy Sarah and James are participating in Moose’s Wild West Experience. Sam and Penny rescue Mandy and her horse after they fall down a slope and get tangled in bushes.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Spotty Rocket / Goodbye Rain Boots / I Can Catch / Thats My Favourite / Tidy Time
programme.desc: Gus gets upset when he cant finish his rocket the way hed planned. / Lu has difficulty letting go of her favourite but now-too-small rain boots. / Lu isnt as good at catching as she thought she was. / Declan is frustrated when Lu has the same favourite thing as him. / Biba gets upset when her clay star goes missing during tidy up time. / Lu and Biba accidentally rig their treasure hunt game.

programme.title: Masha and the Bear
programme.sub-title: Whos the Boss? / Pasta la Vista / Love is in the Bear / Wish Upon a Star / Firefighter of the Day / Awesome Blossoms
programme.desc: Bear needs to step away for a while, leaving Masha, Panda, and Penguin alone at home. It seems to be a simple situation - something all adults can understand. / Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha has no doubts as to how to correctly answer this question. And the proof is right before you: macaroni cooked by Masha herself. / Ah, love, love! Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear and, as usual, dreams of winning his ladys heart. But Masha is also here! / Wow, its another New Year! Masha has a lot of experience in organizing unforgettable celebrations, so she takes matters into her own hands this time, too. / Wow, thats really something! Masha saves Bear from a fire! And a grateful Bear makes her a gift - a toy fire truck. / Bear has a new problem: his garden has been overtaken by dandelions!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Charlies Big Catch / Bessie to the Rescue / Snowball of Doom / King of the Mountain
programme.desc: Charlie takes the schoolchildren on a fishing trip and catches the biggest shoal of fish ever. / Station Officer Steele discovers his old fire engine Bessie which turns out to be useful in a railway emergency. / When Norman and Derek see a video of a champ snowboarder they decide to try snowboarding with an ironing table. / Tom and Moose take the Pontypandy Pioneers on a mountain climbing expedition. / Norman spoils everyones trip to the lighthouse by locking them all out on the balcony in a bid to avoid cleaning Mikes muddy van which he ruined.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Animal Pics / Bear Diet / Balloon Bear / Bear Pillow / Hooks and Loops Bear / Fast Workout / Bat-Grizzy
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. / The fridge in the cabin gets replaced by a new appliance. / Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer the she-bear hes enamored with. / Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. / Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. / The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! / The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. / The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy who is starving sees that the cupboards are bare.

programme.title: Masha and the Bear
programme.sub-title: Try, Try Again / How to Train Your Plant / Princess or Dragon? / The Mystery Guest / Happily Feather After / Sudden Turn / UnBearable Beach
programme.desc: A van with Monkeys arrived at the Bears house. They invite everyone to test themselves with the help of an attraction - a power meter. / She-Bear is going to a resort and leaves Bear with her “pet” – a flycatcher. The modest flower suddenly shows an excellent appetite. / A snow tower? Check. A group of friends? Check. Sound like a recipe for a fun game! / Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! / Spring has dawned, the birds have arrived! But a pigeon settles in the birdhouse near Bear’s house, and Masha, obviously, is more than happy to lure him and caress him. / Bear has made a new purchase: he decided to buy a motorcycle! Now as a cool biker, he plans on impressing She-Bear, but she doesn’t seem to like it very much. / On a nice summer’s day Bear, as usual, goes fishing and Masha follows alongside. But the fishing trip didn’t quite work out.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Floodlights / Girls Night In / Wheel of Fire / To Outfox a Fox / Lily Lost and Found
programme.desc: Christmas is coming and there is to be a competition for the best Christmas lights in Pontypandy. / Mandy offers to babysit Lily when Helen Flood invites Mrs Chen and Penny over for a girls night in but things take a dangerous turn when some curling tongs start a fire. / Charlie is so busy correcting Gareths haphazard preparations for the firework display that he misses a Catherine wheel nailed too tightly to the door of Bessies shed. / When Tom and Moose volunteer to help Mandy and Norman spot a fox the animal scampers off with Mooses hat and Tom and Moose end up stuck in a fox hole. / Everyone goes to the beach for a picnic but Lily needs help when she gets stranded on a sandbank. / Mrs Chens class make sky lanterns for Chinese New Year but until Norman Price creates a disaster when he lets go of his too early.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Wild Modeling / The Bear Next Door / Wild Zapping / Warning: Unlimited Lemmings / Bouncing Bear / Masked Racoon / Spinning Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature form. / Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side there is the same cabin only it doesnt belong to a ranger. / Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. / A road sign battle begins between Grizzy and the Lemmings. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy, slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. / The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. / The Lemmings play with figurines of wild Canadian animals.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Green Eyed Birthday Monster / But Why? / Cupcake Surprise / A New Pet / Dont Want To Miss Out / Penguin Please
programme.desc: Biba gets a birthday present that Lu herself really wants. / Declan learns there are some things we just don’t know the answer to-and that’s OK / Lu learns that she can’t be upset with someone for doing something she has also done / Lu learns to be aware of and include others need for choice / Lu learns to commit to a decision / Declan causes a stir when he decides not to say please. / Elodie upsets Lu when she forgets her promise to push her on the swing.

programme.title: CoComelon Compilations
programme.sub-title: 12345 Once I Caught A Fish Alive and Other Melodies / Itsy Bitsy Spider and Other Melodies / Bath Song
programme.desc: 12345 Once I Caught A Fish Alive and Other Melodies / Itsy Bitsy Spider and Other Melodies / - / It’s summer! Let’s go to the beach! It’s time for some fun under the sun!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Pontypandy Pioneers / Pontypandy Pickle Paddle / Pontypandy Party Planners / Pontypandy in the Park
programme.desc: With Fireman Sam out on an emergency Trevor Evans leads some young explorers on a nature walk to the Mountain Rescue Centre but is he up to it? / On an adventure with the Pioneers, Professor Pickles wants to do things as his ancestors did, until his boat sinks and he needs a modern-day rescue! / Norman and Hannah are organizing a pool party for Peter, but Mike drops some decorations onto a lantern, and soon the rescue team needs to be called. / The residents of Pontypandy have gathered in Pontypandy Park for the annual town festival. The fire fighters are well represented with Sam giving the kids rides on Jupiter. / Its a very hot day in Pontypandy and Joe has invented many solar-powered gadgets including a ridiculous-looking hat with a fan on it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy go bowling - but its hard work, especially when his fingers get stuck in a ball! / Mr Bean takes free food samples from a food truck at a market and sells them to raise funds for a teapot. / Mr Bean wants to watch his favourite TV show with Billy, but Mrs Wicket has other plans. / Mr Bean gate crashes an art exhibition opening party wearing a painted-on tuxedo!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: The Lift / Dig This / Bean Hypnotised
programme.desc: Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers. / Mr Bean digs a hole in his garden… and finds a bomb!! / Mr Bean is in a trance – barks like a dog and starts to dance. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Its Time to Press a Flower
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran press a flower so that it will last for a long time. JoJo learns that flowers wilt over time but flower pressing is a special way to make them last longer.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman claims her horse was injured and then held ransom by a stable owner; the stable owner says she thought the animal had been abandoned.

programme.title: Curious and Unusual Deaths
programme.desc: A shocking look at how dancer Isadora Duncan was strangled when her scarf got caught in a car wheel. Also includes how actor Brandon Lee died when a prop gun misfired.

programme.title: Worlds Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Pots of gold and wishes granted is whats promised if you catch a Leprechaun. But who are these mysterious little creatures and why do they only seem to be found in Ireland?

programme.desc: A beautiful young bartender is swept off her feet by a charismatic up-and-coming rapper. But when a night out takes a violent turn, she sacrifices everything to protect him.

programme.desc: A flooded fancy bathtub ruined the brand new hardwood floors an ex son-in-law installed to make his ex-wifes mom comfortable and that damage splashed this family drama all over Judge Rhondas courtroom.

programme.desc: Kelly and Tonya head to Wyoming to work with Carbon County Law Enforcement to look into the mysterious deaths of two women years apart, but connected by the same circle of friends.

programme.title: Cold Justice
programme.desc: In part two of their investigation, the Cold Justice team continues to investigate three mysterious deaths in Wyoming. Will they be able to finally give answers to all the families involved?

programme.title: Border Security: Australias Front Line
programme.desc: Two well dressed Vietnamese women, travelling with one of their seven year old sons, are found with two loaded bags of heroin.

programme.title: Fraud Squad
programme.desc: A nurse rips off the NHS for thousands of pounds; and a boss of recycling company steals two million pounds of public cash.

programme.title: Heavy Tow Truckers Down Under
programme.desc: Claytons Towing navigates tidal pressures and bull sharks to salvage two yachts from Moreton Bay as part of the Queensland Governments clean-up of abandoned wrecks.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Furious after a rent increase, a woman stops paying and contacts the housing authority citing 24 violations.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman claims her horse was injured and then held ransom by a stable owner; the stable owner says she thought the animal had been abandoned.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A homeless couple accuses an old family friend of cheating them out of their work pay and of harassing them on the job.

programme.title: Dogs Behaving (Very) Badly
programme.desc: After their beloved boxer Beau passed away, Liane got another dog of the same breed, Woody, to mend her sons broken heart. But her plan to fix things has spectacularly backfired - 11-year-old Ben feels bullied by Woody and cant even have his mates over for a kickabout without the dog causing chaos. Can Graeme Hall save the day and reunite a family?.

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: An airport passenger with no solid plans seeks entry for the third time in just two months, and a friendly senior has some unfriendly gear in his RV.

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: An American trying to catch a vacation cruise is busted trying to catch a different kind of trip. Multiple currencies may equal one big problem for a returning Canadian.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Judge Rhonda tries to tie cousins back together who are at the end of their rope when expensive rock climbing equipment seems to falloff a cliff.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: The family rumour mill whispering about a gambling problem turns a loan into a bad bet and drives close cousins since Kindergarten into Judge Rhondas court.

programme.title: Heavy Tow Truckers Down Under
programme.desc: Jessie from GRS Towing is transporting an eight tonne river boat across three states for a desperate NSW oyster farmer, whos relying on the boat to save her familys business.

programme.title: Dogs Behaving (Very) Badly
programme.desc: Graeme Hall tries to help attention-seeking pup Tinkerbell, who wont give her owner a moments peace - including wanting to join her in the shower. He also comes to the aid of grandmother Tracey, whose German Shepherd Oakley, whose bad behaviour is leaving her feeling isolated and unable to enjoy caravanning holidays with her family.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Cousins who were like sisters claim one social media post has put a fork in their relationship and want Judge Rhonda to decide if the damage can be repaired.

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: At Port Metro Vancouver an unusually heavy automobile container hints at trouble, and in Montreal a students stash of comfort food brings him anything but.

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: In Vancouver, a traveller returns from a romantic rendezvous with a surprise in her luggage.
