programme.title: Elle
programme.desc: Michelle è una donna in carriera a capo di unazienda di videogames. Dura e spietata non concede spazio ai sentimenti. Dopo aver subito unaggressione in casa propria, la donna inizia una caccia spietata al suo aggressore, in un torbido gioco che rischia ad ogni passo di sfuggirle di mano.

programme.title: Affari di famiglia
programme.desc: Corey e Chumlee sperano di acquistare un refrigeratore per Coca Cola del 1930. Dopo averlo comprato decideranno di restaurare questo raro pezzo?

programme.title: Affari di famiglia
programme.desc: I proprietari del negozio hanno lopportunita di acquistare un Anello dellNBA Championship 2006. Riusciranno a portare a termine laffare?

programme.title: Steve Austin - Sfida implacabile
programme.desc: Un gruppo di diversi concorrenti, formato da uomini e donne, si cimenta in difficili sfide fisiche. Presenta Steve Austin.

programme.title: Mayday, salvo per un pelo
programme.desc: Una famiglia viaggia verso lIdaho per andare a un funerale e rimane bloccata in una bufera di neve. In cammino per cercare aiuto, la famiglia commette un errore nella rotta e una deviazione sbagliata li catapulta nella natura selvaggia.

programme.title: Mayday, salvo per un pelo
programme.desc: Si raccontano storie straordinarie di persone comuni sopravvissute a situazioni ostili. Analizziamo le difficolta che hanno affrontato e gli sforzi fisici che hanno dovuto compiere per lottare e rimanere in vita.

programme.title: TG24 mezzora
programme.desc: Telegiornale in diretta. I giornali di oggi, lo Sport, il Meteo.

programme.title: TG24 mezzora rassegna
programme.desc: Telegiornale in diretta. Tutti gli aggiornamenti minuto per minuto. Una nuova rassegna stampa multimediale con giornali, siti web, social network. Il Meteo.

programme.title: Tiny House - Piccole case per vivere
programme.desc: Alcune persone vanno alla ricerca del loro mini-spazio perfetto. Troveranno la mini-casa adatta al loro stile di vita?

programme.title: Brother vs Brother
programme.desc: Dieci concorrenti, guidati dai fratelli Jonathan e Drew tenteranno di diventare i nuovi esperti di design. Chi vincera la competizione?

programme.title: Brother vs Brother
programme.desc: Dieci concorrenti, guidati dai fratelli Jonathan e Drew tenteranno di diventare i nuovi esperti di design. Chi vincera la competizione?

programme.title: Love it or List it: Prendere o lasciare
programme.desc: Ryan e Ashley hanno acquistato la loro casa quando lei era incinta di pochi mesi. La coppia adesso pensa sia arrivato il momento di cambiare proprieta.

programme.title: Sky TG24 in pillole
programme.desc: Il telegiornale con le notizie piu importanti del giorno.

programme.title: Love It or List It - Prendere o lasciare
programme.desc: Alcuni esperti tentano di sottoporre le loro idee a clienti indecisi. I proprietari sceglieranno di rinnovare le loro case o di venderle?

programme.title: Cucine da incubo
programme.desc: Chef Cannavacciuolo arriva in provincia di Modena, dove la mancanza di serenita in famiglia si ripercuote sullandamento de "Il diavoletto, i cui affari stanno andando a picco.

programme.title: MasterChef Italia
programme.desc: Siamo giunti allultima Mystery Box: i 3 finalisti dovranno fare i conti con il proprio percorso, proponendo ai giudici Bruno Barbieri, Joe Bastianich, Carlo Cracco e Antonino Cannavacciuolo la rivisitazione di un loro piatto. Solo il migliore riuscira a guadagnare un importante vantaggio per lultimo Invention Test.

programme.title: MasterChef Italia
programme.desc: I concorrenti scoprono gli ingredienti nascosti sotto la Mystery Box dedicata allamore. NellInvention Test, gli aspiranti chef scoprono le creazioni di Nino Rossi. Prox Ep. 17 nov 15:15. Rep. 17 nov 13:45

programme.title: MasterChef Italia
programme.desc: Nella splendida cornice di Valeggio sul Mincio, le 2 brigate devono proporre dei menu che rispettino le tradizioni del luogo. La squadra perdente si gioca la salvezza al Pressure Test. Prox Ep. 18 nov 15:15. Rep. 18 nov 13:45

programme.title: Cucine da incubo
programme.desc: Nonostante sia una struttura a conduzione familiare, i rapporti interni al ristorante "L Civel" sono pessimi. Antonino dovrà insegnare loro a comunicare con un tono più calmo.

programme.title: Alessandro Borghese: Celebrity Chef
programme.desc: Anteprima - Alessandro Borghese apre le porte dei suoi ristoranti, milanese e veneziano, a due celebrities che con laiuto della brigata si sfideranno ai fornelli.

programme.title: Alessandro Borghese: Celebrity Chef
programme.sub-title: Paolo Ruffini e Elena Di Cioccio
programme.desc: Alessandro Borghese oggi apre le porte del suo ristorante di Venezia a Paolo Ruffini e Elena Di Cioccio che con laiuto della brigata si sfideranno ai fornelli.

programme.title: Cucine da incubo
programme.desc: Arriva la terza stagione di Cucine da Incubo. Lo Chef Antonino Cannavacciuolo visita il ristorante Sabatino ad Anguillara Sabazia, in provincia di Roma, dove un titolare dispotico tiranneggia uno staff di sole donne e cucina abusando di panna da cucina.

programme.title: Affari al buio
programme.desc: Iniziano i problemi a Mission Hills, in California, quando un misterioso offerente aspira a dominare la competizione. Darrell lotta per una batteria mentre Dave deve affrontare la sua nemesi.

programme.title: Affari di famiglia
programme.desc: Ai proprietari viene offerto lacquisto di una gamba di legno di un pirata. Riusciranno a formulare una generosa offerta per questo pezzo da collezione?

programme.title: Affari di famiglia
programme.desc: Richard ha lopportunita di acquistare dei filmati su Roosevelt. Poi prepara una sfida davvero difficile per Corey e Chumlee, costretti a competere fra loro.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Un ex agente della CIA si trova invischiato in una missione molto personale che lo vedrà contrapposto al suo ex allievo in un gioco mortale che coinvolge alti funzionari della CIA e il neo-eletto Presidente russo.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Fareed Zakaria brings viewers his insights and analysis, and interviews world leaders, artists, scientists, business leaders, global affairs analysts and other cultural observers for the Global Public Square.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo sits down with Grammy-winning singer Tems in Lagos to trace her journey from bedroom producer to global icon. She opens up about her creative process, meteoric rise, and her mission to empower women through her Leading Vibe Initiative, offering an intimate look at an artist reshaping global music on her own terms.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.sub-title: Marketplace Middle East: The Middle Easts Healthcare Revolution
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.sub-title: Marketplace Africa: Preserving The Great Migration in Kenya; Alex Bram
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Richard celebrates a personal milestone - his 100th country visited - by embarking on an extraordinary journey through Omans rich culture and striking landscapes.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.sub-title: Inside Africa: Ugandas Performing Arts Scene
programme.desc: Across music, dance and comedy, a new wave of Ugandan performers is captivating audiences, all while championing a vibrant creative culture at home. We spotlight three standout talents : Afro-soul musician Joshua Baraka, international Latin dance maestro Valentino R. Kabenge, and comedy superstar Kansiime Anne, exploring how venues like the Uganda National Cultural Centre are nurturing the next generation of Ugandan performers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When an Air Force veteran dies unexpectedly, Kenda and his team must determine if it was a tragic accident or premeditated murder. But before long, they discover that their clean-cut victim had a secret life.

programme.desc: A claimant wants a deposit back for furniture that she purchased but never received.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Lieutenant Joe Kenda and his Colorado Springs crime-fighting team have solved an unprecedented 387 homicide investigations, resulting in a 92 percent solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter will use Kendas first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stories of Kendas most disturbing and challenging murder cases. Homicide Hunters takes viewers behind the scenes with one of the worlds best homicide detectives to learn how murders are solved. A group of friends discover the corpse of small time entrepreneur Jamie Foster hidden under a blanket, with two gunshots to the stomach and one to the head. With scant physical evidence except for a missing safe, Lt. Joe Kenda turns his attention to the victims friends and associates only to discover that Jamie Fosters lucrative business dealings put him in close quarters with a multitude of unsavoury characters. In an attempt to narrow the field, Kenda must uncover the contents of the missing safe, and track down a suspect whose greed led to bloodshed.

programme.desc: Ladybug and her team face an imaginative villain.

programme.desc: Its Mickeys birthday and his pals want to make his birthday wish come true. Kyung Won is having trouble when everyone pays attention to his sister, Ae-Che, on her first birthday!

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.desc: When the gang notices that Teddy is acting differently, they bring him in for a checkup. Goofy finds Care-abelles lost magic grow tool, and things start growing out of control!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Calypso mediates as Bluey and friends accuse Rusty of ruining their game. They were playing a simple game of baby hospital. When Indy’s baby came early (just like her little sister), it needed special care and attention, requiring her mother Indy to be very brave. But Rusty ruined everything by picking the early baby up! Rusty apologies, explaining that he was playing a game of Knights and he was just trying to rescue the kings daughter, kidnapped by a ravenous dragon. As he explains the bravery of the king’s daughter, Bluey and her friends recognise how much their games have in common.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mum and Dads, they can’t agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey loves playing hide and seek, but the family are convinced she will get distracted and forget to find them. Bluey promises to stay focused and, after a count to twenty, the game is on! But her promise quickly comes undone when she uncovers Chattermax (a noisy old toy) hidden under the sink. Bluey is distracted and forgets their game, leaving her frustrated family stuck hiding. It’s only when she rediscovers how noisy and annoying Chattermax can be, and needs help shutting it off, that Bluey at last harnesses her ability to focus, remembers the abandoned game and finds everyone at last.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad collapse on the couch after a busy day, they give Bluey and Bingo five minutes until bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mt MumandDad! Bluey hurries ahead, too impatient to wait for Bingo as she packs her camping supplies, leading to accusations of cheating. All their bickering wakes the rumbling mountain and an avalanche of pillows and tickles sends them scurrying for shelter in Bingo’s tent. Waiting for the storm to pass, Bingo breaks out her supplies and Bluey apologises for cheating. When the storm passes, they make for the summit and plant their flag together.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a quick trip to the shops Bluey, Bingo and Dad play a game of ‘Kids’, where Bluey plays Mum, Bingo is her cute baby, Snowdrop, and Dad is her sulky son, Diddums. Not only does Bluey hamper Dad’s efforts to buy groceries, by buying nothing but junk food, but she also prefers the secretly naughty Snowdrop over Dad and even embarrasses him in front of his friends. When Dad rebels and shows how much of a handful he can really be, Bluey puts her foot down and declares that Snowdrop is her favourite child. Diddums is devastated and Bluey finally recognises why Dads don’t pick favourites.

programme.sub-title: The Mystic Isles: A Very Mystic Wassailia
programme.desc: During the holiday time of Wassailia, Sofia helps Chrysta with last minute Protector missions in the Mystic Isles to help her get home in time to celebrate with her family.

programme.desc: Sofia searches for an animal helper to assist her with a school presentation.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends throw themselves into various games. Strolling the room, teacher Calypso gently nudges the kids into each other’s orbit, and soon make-believe mother Indy is moving into Rusty’s new house while waitressing at Bluey’s fish and chip shop! Everything’s going like clockwork, until an extra-large delivery causes Indy to almost step on Honey’s gnome village! Thankfully, Calypso is ten steps ahead, dispatching the Terriers to defend the village and save the day. Balance is restored. Only Pretzel remains, but his new game of catching fish gives Calypso an idea.

programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Blueys game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand, until they realise they can play it their own way.

programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mum and Dads, they can’t agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its bedtime, and Bingo cant remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their day in the hope of finding Floppy

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey builds herself the perfect make-believe playhouse out of the couch cushions and is delighted when Bingo, Mum and Dad all build their own houses next door! Their new neighbourhood is fantastic, until Bingo takes over Bluey’s reading nook with her growing menagerie of farm animals! Unsure how to resolve the situation amicably, Bluey reaches out to Mum (who’s having issues of her own dealing with a constantly noisy Dad). When Mum demonstrates the power of being firm yet polite with Dad, Bluey is able to find a compromise with Bingo that restores peace to their tiny neighbourhood.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At bedtime Bluey and Bingo are teasing each other. When Mum tells them to stop, they complain that Dad is always teasing them and a heated debate ensues. One by one, Bluey and Bingo recall all the times that Dad has teased them, like when he plays Password or Name Change or when he pretends to be Mum. The girls convince Mum that Dad is a “Big Teaser”, but Dad tells them that teasing is simply a fun way to test their limits. The girls realise that they can give as good as they get and in the end both Dad and the girls finally understand and agree on the difference between teasing and playing.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - theyre not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyones got a wild side.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo’s desire for a pet is tested, when Dad transforms his hand into the chaotic Emu, Shaun. As Shaun turns the house upside down, ignoring their commands, Mum advises Bluey to remain ‘calm and controlled’. So, when an unruly Shaun escapes the lead on a walk and runs for the prickle bushes, Bluey summons her inner-mum and stops the bird in its tracks with a calm command. Now that Bluey has got the upper hand, Dad is run ragged, as Shaun must do everything they say at the park. A tired Dad bids Shaun farewell… just in time for the girls to introduce four baby emus Shaun left behind!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.desc: Dr Dubrow helps an eating disorder survivor feel beautiful in her own skin by downsizing her breasts; Dr Nassif sends a dinosaur nose back to the Jurassic era.

programme.title: Botched
programme.desc: Danielle Milian visits the doctors to fix her scarred stomach and popped implant, while a police officer wants her pig nose gone so she can look like her twin again.

programme.title: Botched
programme.desc: On the road in Montana, the doctors take a mancation, fly-fishing in the great outdoors, and also check in on a woman who had a horrific motorcycle accident.

programme.title: Raising a F***ing Star
programme.sub-title: Fame Is A Four Letter Word
programme.desc: Four families pursue fame and fortune for their talented children. Kia demands 20% of her daughter Flau’Jae’s earnings. Cool struggles with his daughter Daelyanna while shooting a short film. Sam’s mom questions her career choice to be a momager. Breanna feels the pressure from her family to succeed as a supermodel.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium
programme.sub-title: Terrell Owens, Fairuza Balk, Olivia Culpo, Carnie Wilson
programme.desc: Tyler sees a mysterious woman in Terrell Owenss love life and Fairuza Balk has a shocking connection to her recently departed brother. Also, Olivia Culpo is awestruck by her first psychic reading, and Carnie Wilson has a warning and message of hope.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium
programme.sub-title: Dj Quails, Boy George, Rob Dyrdek and Charisma Carpenter
programme.desc: Dj Qualls is left shocked by a life-changing reading with Tyler as his deceased grandfather is brought through from the other side. Boy George refuses to accept Tylers prediction for the future of his love life. Tyler gives Rob Dyrdek a jaw-dropping prediction about his future family. A message about a broken piano key leaves Charisma Carpenter in tears as Tyler brings through her deceased grandmother.

programme.title: Celebrity Game Face
programme.desc: Nikki and Brie Bella, Xavier Wood, Cesaro and Naomi and Jimmy USO compete remotely from their own homes in a night of fun and games hosted by Kevin Hart.

programme.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
programme.desc: Fr. Mitch discusses how the Lord confronts Israel as they bristle at His decision to position a Gentile, King Cyrus, as Israel’s “Messiah”, to set them free from the Babylonians.

programme.title: Great books every catholic should know
programme.desc: No examination of Shakespeare’s works would be complete without focusing on the saints and sinners who populate his stories. Host Joseph Pearce wraps up his look with King Lear, Antony and Cleopatra, and The Tempest.

programme.title: Catechesis: Communion With Jesus Christ
programme.desc: The Sisters explain how man is destined for eternal life with God and how the Sacraments are our gateway to holiness.

programme.title: The Philosophers Bench
programme.desc: Ronald K. Tacelli and Peter Kreeft sit down to discuss why there is so much unhappiness in modern society.

programme.title: The gospel of life vs. the culture of death
programme.sub-title: The Necessity Of Being Faithful Teachers And Preachers
programme.desc: Father Wade Menezes explains why everyone is called to defend the truth.

programme.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
programme.desc: Prof. Robert George joins to discuss ethical concerns within healthcare, noting the rise of embryonic stem cell use and our obligation to protect the weakest and most vulnerable.

programme.title: Explore with the miracle hunter
programme.desc: Michael ONeill investigates the supernatural experiences of Benedicta Rencurel. In 1664, the Virgin Mary gave her messages about prayer for the conversion of sinners, and visited her throughout the rest of her life.

programme.title: The holy land rosary
programme.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations.

programme.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
programme.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama.

programme.title: Chaplet Of St. Michael
programme.desc: Mother Angelica and the Nuns of Our Lady of the Angels Monastery ask for the intercession of the Prince of the Heavenly Hosts and the nine Choirs of Angels, as they pray the chaplet of St. Michael.

programme.title: Benedicta: Marian Chant From Norcia
programme.desc: Experience the daily life of the Benedictine Monks of Norcia, and watch as they record their new album, “Benedicta,” which contains ancient, never-before recorded Marian chants.

programme.title: Generations Unite In Prayer: The Chaplet Of Divine Mercy In Song
programme.sub-title: Generations Unite In Prayer: Divine Mercy Chaplet In Song
programme.desc: Hundreds of kids, teens, parents and grandparents from across the country unite in prayer for the poor, the dying and the unborn in this program featuring award-winning images and soul-stirring music.

programme.title: For god so loved the world
programme.desc: There are 7 testimonies to Jesus in the Gospel of John; 7 instances where Jesus claims His divinity, eg, I am the Bread of Life; I am the Light of the World. In Episode # 2, we start with John 1: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

programme.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
programme.sub-title: Mind And Heart - Contemplative Leadership In Catholic Education
programme.desc: With increasing pressure and importance placed on our school system, Sr. John Dominic interviews Dr. Mimi Schuttloffel, former professor at The Catholic University of America, about her experience in Catholic education.

programme.title: Catholic Sphere
programme.sub-title: Dr. Newman, Is My Doctrine Still Developing? Is Doctrinal Development Good For The Church?
programme.desc: Doug Keck and his panelists discuss St. John Henry Newman’s essay on the development of doctrine and the fruit of his movement toward the Catholic Church and away from Anglicanism.

programme.title: Vaticano
programme.desc: Presenting the latest news from the Vatican with excerpts and analysis of the Holy Father’s recent audiences and writings, newsmaker interviews, highlights of recent events, and feature segments- all from the heart of the Universal Church.

programme.title: Catholics come home

programme.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts.

programme.desc: Doug Keck and his panelists discuss St. John Henry Newman’s essay on the development of doctrine and the fruit of his movement toward the Catholic Church and away from Anglicanism.

programme.title: Our Lady Of The Rosary At Pompeii

programme.title: Lamie prodigieuse
programme.sub-title: Celle qui fuit et celle qui reste
programme.desc: Les visites de Nino se font plus frequentes, tout comme ses assauts à l’encontre de Pietro qu’il denigre et critique sans retenue. Adèle propose de publier le livre d’Elena, lequel sera egalement traduit en français. Elena et Nino se rapprochent et entament bientôt une liaison. Mais la jeune femme sinterroge sur les sentiments de Nino qui, selon elle, naimera jamais que Lila...

programme.title: Quand la tele derape, 40 ans de scandales
programme.desc: Christophe Dechavanne raconte la television provocatrice, scandaleuse et irreverencieuse des annees 1980, 1990 et 2000, quil a vecue de linterieur. Des emissions politiques aux talk-shows, des divertissements aux JT, aucun genre na echappe à son derapages parfois provoques, souvent imprevus.

programme.title: Outremer.story
programme.desc: "Outremer.story" met en lumière lengagement de deux anonymes ultramarins. Lemission plonge dans le quotidien de celles et de ceux qui prennent soin des autres et qui font des Outre-mer des terres de solutions. Dans lHexagone ou dans un territoire ultramarin, ils partagent leurs passions ou leurs combats, en valorisant la richesse des Outre-mer.

programme.title: La vie à velo
programme.desc: "La vie à velo" est le premier magazine consacre uniquement à la pratique du velo et à tout lecosystème (economique et ecologique) qui entoure ce phenomène de societe.

programme.title: Les matinales
programme.desc: Programme de musique classique pour se reveiller en douceur.

programme.title: Questions pour un champion
programme.desc: Un jeu realise par Olivier Baudoin et Karl Grosse Produit par Fremantle, avec la participation de France 3 Anime par Samuel Etienne Jeu emblematique construit autour de la culture generale, lemission culte "Questions pour un champion" se deroule en trois manches : - Le "9 points gagnants" lors de laquelle la rapidite est de mise. - Le "4 à la suite" où dans un temps de 40 secondes maximum, le but est de donner 4 bonnes reponses à la suite sur un thème choisi. - Et le "Face-à-face", manche lors de laquelle plus vous repondez rapidement, plus vous marquez de points. Le premier candidat qui atteint 12 points remporte le match.

programme.title: Nos terres gourmandes
programme.desc: Une production Wide Studios Avec la participation de France Televisions Carinne Teyssandier nous embarque pour un voyage au cœur des saveurs des regions de France.

programme.title: ICI Matin
programme.desc: De 6h30 à 9h, " Ici Matin " est votre premier rendez-vous de la journee avec linformation de proximite. Elle ouvre les matinees 100 % regionales de France 3. Au programme, des journaux dinformation en hyper proximite tous les quarts dheure, des points meteo et trafic reguliers.

programme.title: ICI dans votre region
programme.desc: Des magazines ou documentaires proposes par votre antenne regionale.

programme.title: Consomag
programme.desc: Le magazine de lInstitut national de la consommation donne à chacun des conseils pratiques pour mieux consommer.

programme.title: Escales en France
programme.desc: Ce nouveau magazine va, au quotidien, vous faire decouvrir les regions françaises en plongeant le telespectateur au cœur dune ville, dun departement français, dune region, et lui fera decouvrir son histoire, ses richesses patrimoniales, ses specialites gastronomiques, et ses lieux incontournables … "Escales en France" ira à la rencontre de ces Français agriculteurs, marins pecheurs, artisans, restaurateurs, eleveurs, guides touristiques, tous amoureux fous de leurs regions.

programme.title: Nos terres gourmandes
programme.desc: Une production Wide Studios Avec la participation de France Televisions Carinne Teyssandier nous embarque pour un voyage au cœur des saveurs des regions de France.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: Bulletin meteorologique du service de presse de France 3-Meteo France.

programme.title: Outremer.linfo
programme.desc: Linformation ultramarine trouve sa place dans un format de 9 minutes. "Outremer.linfo" permet une couverture plus large et un suivi accru des Ultramarins vivant dans lHexagone.

programme.title: Le journal des talents
programme.desc: Magazine dinformation consacre aux personnes talentueuses et aux heros du quotidien en region.

programme.title: On vous emmène ici
programme.desc: Une production par les redactions regionales de France 3 Presente en alternance par Raphaëlle Tavernier et Gregoire Bouscambert Chaque jour, on prendra le temps… Le temps dun reportage pour raconter nos territoires, sarreter dans un site remarquable, un lieu emblematique, un patrimoine à decouvrir…

programme.title: ICI 12/13 - Edition toute region
programme.desc: Le rendez-vous de la mi-journee des 24 redactions regionales de France Televisions, avec les journaux locaux, les reportages propres à chaque region, la meteo, mais aussi un regard de proximite sur lactualite nationale et internationale.

programme.title: Meteo à la carte
programme.desc: Une emission realisee par Captain Productions Une production Enibas Productions, A Prime Group, avec la participation de France Televisions Redacteurs en chef : Stephane Evanno et Laetitia Bouchon Presentee par Marine Vignes et Laurent Romejko En direct "Meteo à la carte", un magazine quotidien en direct, consacre à la meteo et à ses implications dans notre vie de tous les jours. De leur côte, chefs et cuisiniers amateurs valorisent au travers de leurs recettes des produits de saison, cultives à proximite.

programme.title: Meteo à la carte (la suite)
programme.desc: Une emission realisee par Captain Productions Une production Enibas Productions, A Prime Group, avec la participation de France Televisions Redacteurs en chef : Stephane Evanno et Laetitia Bouchon Presentee par Marine Vignes et Laurent Romejko En direct Ce nouveau format se veut encore plus interactif. Les telespectateurs gardent une place importante dans lemission et sur les reseaux. Les photos et videos envoyees vont etre davantage mises en valeur.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Notre pire Ennemi est dans notre Coeur
programme.desc: Alors quelle emmène ses enfants au cinema, Candice vole au secours dun vieux monsieur agresse par une jeune femme. Elle se retrouve alors avec quatre enfants fâches et un gros cas de conscience: la victime est le president dune association anti-avortement.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Le groupe Renoir intègre un nouveau brigadier tout aussi barjo que leur commandant : Candice et le nouveau degustent à tour de rôle la peinture qui macule le corps de la victime. Cette peinture comestible les mettra sur la piste dune crèche clandestine, puis dune maman en plein baby blues...

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tout homme ressemble à sa douleur
programme.desc: Lex de Chrystelle, nouvellement reapparu dans sa vie, disparaît. Compte tenu de la nature du passif qui les oppose, tous les soupçons se portent rapidement sur elle. Candice, soutenue par Antoine, enquete nuit et jour pour tâcher de disculper son lieutenant.

programme.title: La ptite librairie
programme.sub-title: Memoires dun vieux con, de Roland Topor
programme.desc: François Busnel propose chaque jour de decouvrir ou redecouvrir une oeuvre française ou etrangère : roman, essai, grand classique ou encore bande dessinee.

programme.title: Duels en familles
programme.desc: Un jeu realise par Ben Cap Produit par CYRILPROD et A Prime Group Dans un decor dappartement geant, deux familles de quatre membres viennent defendre les couleurs de leur region en saffrontant chaque jour de la semaine, au cours de trois duels et une finale. Au programme : duels en images, duels en regions, duels de mots, duels en musique, duels en culture … Chaque jour, la famille victorieuse se qualifie pour la finale pour tenter de remporter 2000 €. Le vendredi, pour le dernier match de la semaine, cest une grande finale à 5000 € qui attend les candidats. Quelle sera la famille et donc la region gagnante de la semaine ?

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Un jeu realise par Antoine Galey, Patricia Rimond des Anges et Philippe Letourneur Produit par Effervescence Label, avec la participation de France 3 Anime par Theo Curin Accessible à tous les publics, "Slam" est un jeu de lettres 100 % original qui fait la joie des amoureux des mots, des ferus de quiz et des adeptes des mots fleches, en mixant tous les genres, de la geographie aux mathematiques, en passant par la chimie... et bien sûr le français. Au menu : vivacite desprit, humour, vocabulaire, orthographe et bien sûr culture generale !

programme.title: Journal Meteo climat
programme.desc: Le point quotidien sur lactualite meteo et climatique, avec des reportages et des interviews dexperts.

programme.title: ICI 19/20 edition toutes regions
programme.desc: L’actualite vue ICI depuis nos regions.

programme.title: Tout le sport
programme.desc: Toute lactualite sportive nationale et internationale avec "Tout le sport", le plus ancien magazine sportif quotidien de la television française. Lemission est diffusee en direct sur France 3 à 20h45 du lundi au samedi, presentee par Fabien Leveque du lundi au jeudi et par Matthieu Lartot vendredi et samedi.

programme.title: Le mag Ligue 1
programme.desc: EN DIRECT Page quotidienne inedite entièrement dediee à la Ligue 1 de football, offrant une immersion totale au cœur du championnat de France : resumes des matchs, analyses des performances, interviews des acteurs majeurs, et bien plus encore.

programme.title: Meteo regionale
programme.desc: Un bulletin meteorologique propre à chaque region.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Alors quAchille commence à realiser la gravite de ses actes, la police decouvre quElise na pas dit toute la verite dans laffaire de lagression de Pauline.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Alors que Pablo nest pas optimiste quant à son avenir, lequipe de Becker realise quElise leur a cache des choses.

programme.title: Voyez comme on danse
programme.desc: Un matin, Bertrand quitte Elisabeth. Julien, totalement paranoïaque, est persuade d’etre suivi en permanence, ce qui met hors d’elle sa femme, Lucie.

programme.title: Journal Meteo climat
programme.desc: Le point quotidien sur lactualite meteo et climatique, avec des reportages et des interviews dexperts.

programme.title: Le dernier combat des gueules bleues
programme.desc: Dans louest de la France, en Anjou, lindustrie ardoisière a fait vivre au fil des siècles des centaines de milliers de personnes. Travaillant dans des conditions extremes, les ardoisiers-mineurs tombaient jadis souvent malades de la silicose, la maladie des mineurs.

programme.title: Sunshine, danser de Cayenne à New York
programme.desc: La danseuse Sunshine, 14 ans, est dejà suivie par près de 100 000 personnes sur les reseaux sociaux. La jeune guyanaise est bien partie pour aller très loin, notamment dans les comedies musicales.

programme.title: La ptite librairie
programme.sub-title: Memoires dun vieux con, de Roland Topor

programme.title: Le monument prefere des Français
programme.desc: Quatorze monuments, representant chacun une region de France, se disputent le titre de Monument prefere des français 2025. Après un vote ouvert au public en juillet, lemission presentee par Stephane Bern deroule le classement de lensemble des Monuments et devoile le monument laureat de cette edition.

programme.title: Les carnets de Julie
programme.desc: Julie se rend en terre perigourdine, connue pour ses delicieux produits : foie gras, truffe, noix, vins de Bergerac. Cest aussi la region dorigine de Michel de Montaigne, lun des tous premiers philosophes de langue française. Si Montaigne est davantage un travailleur acharne quun gros mangeur, il nen oublie pas pour autant les plaisirs de la table, et considère meme le repas comme une experience essentielle de "lhumaine condition".

programme.title: Escales en France
programme.desc: Ce nouveau magazine va, au quotidien, vous faire decouvrir les regions françaises en plongeant le telespectateur au cœur dune ville, dun departement français, dune region, et lui fera decouvrir son histoire, ses richesses patrimoniales, ses specialites gastronomiques, et ses lieux incontournables … "Escales en France" ira à la rencontre de ces Français agriculteurs, marins pecheurs, artisans, restaurateurs, eleveurs, guides touristiques, tous amoureux fous de leurs regions.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Un jeu realise par Antoine Galey, Patricia Rimond des Anges et Philippe Letourneur Produit par Effervescence Label, avec la participation de France 3 Anime par Theo Curin Accessible à tous les publics, "Slam" est un jeu de lettres 100 % original qui fait la joie des amoureux des mots, des ferus de quiz et des adeptes des mots fleches, en mixant tous les genres, de la geographie aux mathematiques, en passant par la chimie... et bien sûr le français. Au menu : vivacite desprit, humour, vocabulaire, orthographe et bien sûr culture generale !

programme.title: ICI 12/13 - Edition toute region
programme.desc: Le rendez-vous de la mi-journee des 24 redactions regionales de France Televisions, avec les journaux locaux, les reportages propres à chaque region, la meteo, mais aussi un regard de proximite sur lactualite nationale et internationale.

programme.title: Meteo à la carte
programme.desc: Une emission realisee par Captain Productions Une production Enibas Productions, A Prime Group, avec la participation de France Televisions Redacteurs en chef : Stephane Evanno et Laetitia Bouchon Presentee par Marine Vignes et Laurent Romejko En direct "Meteo à la carte", un magazine quotidien en direct, consacre à la meteo et à ses implications dans notre vie de tous les jours. De leur côte, chefs et cuisiniers amateurs valorisent au travers de leurs recettes des produits de saison, cultives à proximite.

programme.title: Meteo à la carte (la suite)
programme.desc: Une emission realisee par Captain Productions Une production Enibas Productions, A Prime Group, avec la participation de France Televisions Redacteurs en chef : Stephane Evanno et Laetitia Bouchon Presentee par Marine Vignes et Laurent Romejko En direct Ce nouveau format se veut encore plus interactif. Les telespectateurs gardent une place importante dans lemission et sur les reseaux. Les photos et videos envoyees vont etre davantage mises en valeur.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Depuis que son adjoint la quittee pour la PJ et quelle a ete humiliee aux assises, Candice broie du noir... au point de se teindre les cheveux et de renoncer à ses methodes denquete habituelles. Autour delle, coequipiers et enfants sinquiètent. Aura-t-elle la force de resoudre cette enquete sur la mort dun chef dentreprise aux methodes de management extremes ?

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Le docteur Adler, psychiatre renomme, vient signaler le futur meurtre dun des membres du groupe Renoir. Une femme aurait la ferme intention de sen prendre à Antoine. Lequipe prend laffaire au serieux et pense à une vengeance plutôt quà une plaisanterie. Antoine a bien des ennemis, mais il ne semble pas connaître la personne en question, une jeune femme de 20 ans. Parallèlement, le commandant Canovas seloigne de Candice, peu enclin à lui pardonner ses infidelites.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Mieux vaut labondance que le besoin
programme.desc: Quelle atroce fin que celle de Joachim Brisset, empoisonne à la strychnine. Pour Candice, cest dautant plus incomprehensible que le jeune homme navait aucune raison detre dans la region. Officiellement il venait de trouver un travail à Cuba. Que faisait-il donc à Sète ? Pourquoi mentait-il à sa famille ? Est-ce que cela a un lien avec cette etrange communaute de gratuivores qui squattent un vieil immeuble et où Joachim avait trouve refuge ?

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Au lycee, les dernières revelations laissent les elèves sous le choc. Quant à Elodie et Ludo, ils comptent bien convaincre William de les rejoindre dans leur croisade.

programme.title: Rendez-vous avec le crime
programme.desc: Le detective Samson Brion, desormais incontournable grâce à la renommee de lagence Ardo, est sollicite par le notaire de Dorvoix pour demeler une mysterieuse succession. En effet, à la disparition de Marie Tiberge, son fils Fred a decouvert un testament enigmatique : la ferme familiale doit etre partagee avec sa sœur Olivia, pourtant decedee quinze ans plus tôt dans un accident tragique. Mais lacte de decès dOlivia reste introuvable, tandis que tout le village jure avoir assiste à son enterrement. En quete de verite, Samson, epaule par la bouillonnante Lila, embarque pour une enquete de Dorvoix à Lille, remontant les pistes dun lourd secret de famille.

programme.title: Rendez-vous avec le crime
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 - Rendez-vous avec le crime
programme.desc: Quand Samson Brion, un policier sous couverture, debarque dans son village natal du fond de la Bretagne quinze ans après lavoir brutalement quitte, la plupart des habitants voient ce retour dun très mauvais oeil.

programme.title: Le dernier quart dheure
programme.desc: Un homme a ete condamne à mort. En ultime recours, deux avocats se rendent au Palais de lElysee pour demander la grâce presidentielle.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: En 1983, lancien chef de la Gestapo Klaus Barbie est arrete. Robert Badinter raconte le sentiment ambivalent qui lhabite.

programme.title: Secrets dhistoire
programme.sub-title: Henriette dAngleterre : noces de sang à Versailles
programme.desc: Le 31 mars 1661, Philippe dOrleans, lextravagant et unique frère du roi Louis XIV, epouse Henriette-Anne Stuart, la sœur de Charles II, roi dAngleterre. Ce mariage maladroit entre deux personnes de sang royal que tout oppose alimente dejà tous les scandales à Versailles. Il plonge la jeune Henriette dans la tourmente et lenfer domestique. Le destin dHenriette dAngleterre va meme la conduire jusquà une mort soudaine, dont les circonstances restent encore très floues aujourdhui. Cest à travers cette histoire digne dun roman, sur fond de jalousie et de complots, que Stephane Bern propose de decouvrir les acteurs inattendus de cet episode meconnu à la cour du Roi Soleil.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: When Castle appears on a late-night talk show to promote his book, Heat Wave, legendary host Bobby Mann leans in during a commercial break and whispers, “They want me dead”. When Mann dies later that night, seemingly of natural causes, Castle has to convince Beckett that there was foul play. During the investigation, Castle is seduced by a Hollywood hottie who was the other guest on Bobby Mann’s show the night he died.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: The Abbott staff heads to the Pennsylvania Educational Conference. Gregory reluctantly attends after a disagreement with Amber and bonds with Janine over their similarities. Jacob finds himself charmed by the Addington teachers.

programme.desc: A couple caring for elderly parents couldnt afford a home for themselves until fate stepped in and he won a million dollars on a scratcher. Now, David searches for a well-appointed condo with a huge kitchen so she can cook her famous Italian Bolognese!

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: With a lottery win in her pocket and a baby just around the corner, a woman is ready to move back home to Shelburne, Canada. Affordable oceanfront properties are on Davids list, and hes ready to help find her dream home.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.sub-title: Beach Bound on the Lost Coast of California
programme.desc: A Nevada couple relocating to California are hoping to start a new life in the oceanfront town of Shelter Cove.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.sub-title: Needing A Home In Los Angeles
programme.desc: A couple who have relocated to be together are looking to buy a home together in Los Angeles. They want to find a home quickly before their wedding.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A couple has $1 million to spend on a place in Destin, Florida. Shes pushing for a condo right on the beach, but hed prefer a single family home on the bayside.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek and Christina get a hot tip on a great deal for a 60s single story home in Costa Mesa, CA. Once work starts on the home, they immediately run into big ticket issues.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: When it comes to dream pools, a group of backyard renovation professionals know what it takes to create over-the-top, award-winning oases for their clients.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.sub-title: A Natural Fit For A Fun Family
programme.desc: After moving to their forever home, a young family from College Grove, TN, is ready to build their dream pool. The Pool Kings accept the challenge, creating a tropical paradise with a massive waterfall, a swim-up bar and an oversized outdoor kitchen.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.sub-title: An Art Workshop At The Silos
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire guests, Joanna transforms the Seed and Supply building at the Silos into a flower art workshop and crafting space.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna updates an entry foyer and dining room with an elegant take on the homeowners Southwestern style, using earthy colours and refined details.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Tamara and her dad help a recent widow who loves to cook for her family design her dream kitchen, turning a small galley space into a giant chefs kitchen perfect for entertaining and large gatherings.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A Tennessee couple look for a relaxing cabin. They want a place to practice music, archery and enjoy the quiet while staying close to the Nashville music scene.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: After discovering Evergreen, Colorado, family of five are ready to hunt for a forever cabin in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple hunts for a Connecticut cabin to raise their daughters. He wants land for privacy and hunting, while shes looking for an updated kitchen.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: After more than a dozen years of searching, the team may have discovered the legendary Chappell Vault.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: In our modern world, we believe technology safeguards us from disasters. But are we truly protected? Are we as vulnerable today as our ancestors were to fires, earthquakes, and hurricanes?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Back in Las Vegas, the guys are ready to hit the jackpot. With the home field advantage, Chum beams at a lightbulb trick from Vegas own Mr. Electric, while Rick kneels on a stool from Queen Elizabeth IIs coronation.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: Historys Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: A German American pilot, Dieter Dengler, uses survival skills honed as a child to escape a secret prison in Laos in the early years of the Vietnam war.

programme.title: Historys Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: Humanity has been fascinated by the notion that man will one day travel through time. But what if time travel has already taken place? People may have managed to journey through the fabric of time, whether by design... or perhaps, by accident?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence

programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field, leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers deep inside the mysterious Mesa.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: While the team continues to hunt down the legendary Chappell Vault in the Money Pit, new structures are uncovered in the mysterious swamp that strengthen a developing theory.

programme.title: Gregory Peck: The Gentleman Actor
programme.desc: All over the world, there are giant monoliths that our ancestors carved out of solid rock. What was the purpose of these monuments? Did they serve some kind of ritual function? Were they intended to honour the gods? Or designed to conduct energy?

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.sub-title: Pawn it Out of the Park
programme.desc: Rick heads east to test a rare weapon from the 18th century. Back at the shop, Corey takes a swing at a Mickey Mantle rookie card. Then, military expert Alex brews something special for Ricks eyes only.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Corey bets it all on an original Triple Crown Trophy, lets see if he can win this horse race. Next the guys call in Rick Dale to save what might be one of the very first rides from Coney Island.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Things get scary when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King. Will all work and no play make Corey a dull boy? Corey pays lip service to a Harrison family tradition when a James Bond poster comes in. Does he spy a deal?

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: It’s one of the most infamous and unsolved mob murders--notorious mobster Bugsy Siegel is gunned down in his Beverly Hills living room. Bugsy Siegel made a lot of enemies across the country, but who killed him, and why?

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: Rising from the sands of the Egyptian desert is one of the ancient world’s greatest wonders--the mighty Sphinx. This mythological creature, with the head of a human and the body of a lion, looks like it’s standing guard at the great pyramids of Giza.

programme.title: Historys Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings are still missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: In the swamp, the team uncovers a previously unknown structure remarkably resembling a container. And after weeks of chasing the elusive Chappell Vault, the Fellowship hits a void deep in the Money Pit.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: For centuries archaeologists and explorers have been obsessed with locating ancient cities lost to time. How does a once-thriving community become a lost city? And if their ruins are found, what secrets might be they reveal about human history?

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars stake a claim to an original 1800s Vampire defense kit. Then, Rick gets a chance to buy a work from one of Americas most famous artists, James Whistler. Meanwhile, Rick takes a look at a James Bond prop from the movie GoldenEye.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: $1 million is on the line when a photograph of Abraham and Mary Todd Lincoln makes its way into the shop. Next, an Easter egg signed by the entire Bush family sends Chumlee hopping.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.sub-title: The Lost City Of The Maya
programme.desc: Considered by many to be the greatest civilization in the history of the Americas, the Maya thrived for more than 2,000 years. Now, new evidence is being discovered that completely upends our understanding of this ancient culture.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny
programme.desc: Stalins gruesome trials to create a hybrid human-ape super army; the eerie reason East Germanys Stasi collected the scents of dissidents in airtight jars; how the CIA uncovered a secret Soviet island devoted to developing deadly bioweapons.

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: For centuries, archaeologists have tried to unravel the mysteries of how - and why - certain incredible structures like the Great Pyramid at Giza, the staircase at Loretto Chapel, and Coral Castle were built. Will we ever find the answers?

programme.desc: Has the US Government been hiding the truth about aliens? Are the recent UAP incidents presented to the Congress proof that UAP are a threat to national security? Journalist Tony Harris and his team will evaluate compelling evidence.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: In the swamp, the team uncovers a previously unknown structure remarkably resembling a container. And after weeks of chasing the elusive Chappell Vault, the Fellowship hits a void deep in the Money Pit.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: For centuries archaeologists and explorers have been obsessed with locating ancient cities lost to time. How does a once-thriving community become a lost city? And if their ruins are found, what secrets might be they reveal about human history?

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars stake a claim to an original 1800s Vampire defense kit. Then, Rick gets a chance to buy a work from one of Americas most famous artists, James Whistler. Meanwhile, Rick takes a look at a James Bond prop from the movie GoldenEye.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: $1 million is on the line when a photograph of Abraham and Mary Todd Lincoln makes its way into the shop. Next, an Easter egg signed by the entire Bush family sends Chumlee hopping.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.sub-title: The Lost City Of The Maya
programme.desc: Considered by many to be the greatest civilization in the history of the Americas, the Maya thrived for more than 2,000 years. Now, new evidence is being discovered that completely upends our understanding of this ancient culture.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny
programme.desc: Stalins gruesome trials to create a hybrid human-ape super army; the eerie reason East Germanys Stasi collected the scents of dissidents in airtight jars; how the CIA uncovered a secret Soviet island devoted to developing deadly bioweapons.

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: For centuries, archaeologists have tried to unravel the mysteries of how - and why - certain incredible structures like the Great Pyramid at Giza, the staircase at Loretto Chapel, and Coral Castle were built. Will we ever find the answers?

programme.sub-title: Alice In Chains - Alice in Chains
programme.desc: In their first live concert in over 2 years (and possibly their last concert ever), Alternative/metal group Alice in Chains performs acoustically at MTV Unplugged. Includes acoustic versions of the hit songs "Got Me Wrong," "Rooster," "Would?," and "Down in a Hole."

programme.title: Dio - Dio: Live in London - Hammersmith Apollo 1993
programme.desc: Filmed at Londons Hammersmith Apollo on 12th December 1993 this previously unreleased concert film captures the then newly reformed Dio on the last night of their European tour in support of the "Strange Highways" album. With a line-up of Ronnie James Dio (vocals), Vinny Appice (drums), Jeff Pilson (bass) and Tracy G (guitar) the band delivered a blistering performance on tracks from their new album, previous Dio classics and favourites from Ronnies career with Black Sabbath and Rainbow. So take a ride on "Strange Highways" and be blown away by one of the greatest rock bands of all time.

programme.title: Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Do not just be fascinated by the beauty and girlishness of this bright-eyed Englishwoman. Ellie Goulding has a lot more to offer fans of good pop music and its electronic variations. Since releasing her first album in 2010, Ellie has traveled the world to showcase her talents, both in the voice and in the composition of her songs. These talents can be seen in this show at the iTunes Festival in London, with special mention for the songs "Burn", "Halcyon", "Lights" and "My Blood".

programme.title: The Day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Janis Joplin was one of the most successful and widely-known female rock stars of her era. After releasing three albums, she died of a heroin overdose at the age of 27. Her fourth album, Pearl, was released in January 1971, just over three months after her death. It reached number one on the Billboard charts. Her Legacy. The big-voiced, bluesy singer dominated the stage, forged her own path and paved the way for the female singers who followed.

programme.title: Eagles of Death Metal - I love You All the Time: Live In Paris
programme.desc: During Eagles Of Death Metals 13th November 2015 show at the Bataclan concert hall in Paris a very unfortunate, tragic event occurred. On the 16th February, 2016, the band returned to The Olympia in Paris to complete their show. This is no ordinary performance given the tragedy that occurred in the French capital just three months earlier. This stand-out concert sees the band return in honour of the city, providing an emotive and extraordinary live show. Their track Wannabe In L.A. is aptly re-titled for the night to Wannabe In Paris and other highlights include the cover of Duran Durans hit Save A Prayer.

programme.title: Oasis: Live at Wembley
programme.desc: Filmed at Wembley Arena, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Oasis featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Champagne Supernova, Don’t Look Back In Anger, Rock N Roll Star and many more.

programme.desc: Die Musikfestivals „Rock Am Ring“ auf dem Nurburgring und „Rock Im Park“ in Nurnberg finden jahrlich statt. Mit The Killers.

programme.title: Classic Album: Ace of Spades
programme.desc: In 1980, MOTORHEAD released their fourth album Ace Of Spades. Loud, fast and overwhelmingly heavy, Ace of Spades would propel MOTORHEAD into the ranks of Heavy Metals elite and 25 years later is still considered a benchmark album in its genre. MOTORHEAD - Ace Of Spades Classic Album sees Lemmy, "Fast" Eddie Clarke and Philip "Philthy Animal" Taylor talk candidly about the writing and recording of the album and the goings on inside the MOTORHEAD camp at the time. Watch "Fast" Eddie as he demonstrates how the riff for Ace Of Spades came about, and see the trio (with the help of modern technology) together on the same stage once again. Also featured are exclusive interviews with the likes of Slash (Guns and Roses, Velvet Revolver), Lars Ulrich (Metallica), Dave Brock (Hawkwind), and many more. At the front of the New Wave of British Heavy Metal is MOTORHEAD. Formed in 1975 by former Hawkwind bassist Lemmy Kilmister, the band endured several lineup changes in its early years, and the revolving door lineup began again, with Lemmy continuing to be the driving force of MOTORHEAD.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A case that began when two cyclists searching for a lost wallet along a wooded trail in Florida, found a womans scattered bones instead. A dogged detective searched for the womans identity and her killer.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A womans body is found in a tent bag in the Kentucky woods. 1000 miles away, a family seeks a missing mum. Both cases go unsolved for decades - until now.

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: Family, friends and investigators recount the most provocative crimes ever committed by the unlikeliest of pairs: sisters. How and why do they descend into darkness?

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: Popular cheerleader, Charity, appears to be a typical teen to the outside world. But her family believe she is possessed by a demon and they want to remove it.

programme.title: Shadow of Doubt
programme.sub-title: The Lawyer, The Dancer, And The Hitman
programme.desc: Financial desperation in the down-turned market sends a real estate lawyer to meet a mystery investor who swears to solve all his problems. But when the encounter turns deadly, an exotic dancer may be the only person willing to tell the truth.

programme.title: Shadow of Doubt
programme.desc: A case in which a woman was found sexually assaulted and bleeding from a single bullet wound at her place of employment. At first appeared to be a robbery gone wrong, but over the years the investigation snared multiple suspects, before taking a significant turn 10 years later.

programme.title: Seduced To Slay
programme.desc: When single mother Linda Damm goes missing in Lafayette, Colorado, police get a tip from an anonymous caller telling them where to find her body and who her unexpected killer is. Is there more to the case than meets the eye?

programme.title: Seduced To Slay
programme.desc: Kosta and Lisa Fotopoulos are a Daytona Beach power couple in 1989. Kosta owns a bar and hires sultry Deidre Hunt as a waitress. Soon, a torrid affair, a deadly home invasion and a videotaped murder all result from a tailspin of greed and seduction.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: When the body of 18-year-old Tina Hendricks is found in a canal, police home in on a local bar. But it will take a cross country manhunt to find her killer.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: After 32-year-old Mark Muellers body is pulled from the shore of Lake Michigan, police wonder how his favorite fishing spot became a scene for murder. Its not until his burned-out car is found miles away that officers finally get some answers.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: CSI Alina Burroughs opens the vault on one of her most notorious cases, the death of toddler Caylee Anthony. Re-examining the grim clues, including a controversial strip of duct tape, Alina tries to let the evidence speak for a child without a voice.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: CSI Alina Burroughs revisits a murder that’s haunted a college campus for decades -- the bludgeoning death of Stacie Pannell. Alina takes a fresh look at an investigation and discovers there may be even more to this story than meets the eye.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Two young women are savagely murdered. One has gone fishing only to turn up beaten and drowned, and the other is a pregnant mother attacked while on the job delivering newspapers. Are strangers responsible, or are the culprits much closer to home?

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: One young woman is found with a shotgun wound to her head shortly after moving in with her new boyfriend. Then, a couple planning their wedding are gunned down in their own backyard. Will secrets from the past explain these unimaginable deaths?

programme.title: American Monster
programme.sub-title: The Whole Building Is Full of Snakes!
programme.desc: Ben Renick is a world-renowned breeder of exotic snakes. Hes not even 30 and he seems to have it all - until someone he loves hatches a venomous plot.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: To grandparents Ron and Kay Wilkson, family comes first. But in 2016, something evil is prowling close to home, and not everyone will make it out alive.

programme.title: I (Almost) Got Away With It
programme.desc: When Philip Williams watches the news and sees he is wanted for questioning, he goes on the run. Did he murder his ex-girlfriend and can he escape detection?

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop leads to a deadly discovery in a suburban home in Massachusetts, and officers realise theyve apprehended a serial killer.

programme.sub-title: I Know Who The Real Monster Is
programme.desc: Suspicious signs lead to shocking revelations in these true stories of people who discovered they lived with a killer. Will they become entangled in evil?

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: The 1999 murders of physicians Kenneth Stahl and his wife Carolyn along a desolate Ortega Highway by Adriana Vasco and Dennis Earl Godley. Kenneth had enjoyed an affair with Vasco and concocted a plan to kill his wife to avoid a costly divorce. However, the plot took a twist when Godley killed him as well.

programme.title: Who The (Bleep) Did I Marry?
programme.desc: The custody battle between Nabela Henry and her husband Saad Abdo. Matters intensified when she filed for divorce, and he fled to Lebanon with their two children.

programme.title: Who The (Bleep) Did I Marry?
programme.desc: When former city cop Chris admits to his young wife Audrey that he has gambled away all their money she asks for a divorce. But will her desperate husband let her go?

programme.title: Who The (Bleep) Did I Marry?
programme.desc: When Amber Frey met Scott Peterson, she thought she found her soul mate. However, when she discovered he was at the heart of a police investigation into the 2002 murders of his pregnant wife Laci, she became a key witness in the trial that resulted in his conviction.

programme.title: Who The (Bleep) Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Shaina is mourning the loss of her baby daughter, when her son Zach tells her that his stepdad Joe has been abusing him. Did Joe murder their baby?

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Heather and Daniels teenage romance blossoms into a marriage. However, with Daniels twin brother always hanging around, passion soon turned to poison.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: When Manjit Basra and Mukhtiar Panghali settle down and start a family, it seems like a dream come true. But this dream turns into a nightmare, with a heart-breaking ending that leaves everyone questioning what they thought they knew.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Eighty-one-year-old Bob Harrod is overjoyed when he marries his childhood sweetheart after sixty years apart. But days before his new bride moves in, Bob vanishes. Police cannot locate him and soon find a strong motive for foul play: Bob is a millionaire.

programme.title: Disappeared

programme.title: The Departed - Il bene e il male
programme.desc: Un poliziotto sotto copertura e un criminale conducono una doppia vita.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: Quando, dopo aver subito una tragedia personale, un dirigente pubblicitario newyorchese di successo si ritira dalla vita sociale, i suoi amici escogitano un drastico piano per raggiungerlo prima che perda tutto.

programme.title: Se mi lasci ti cancello
programme.sub-title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: Un uomo scopre che la sua fidanzata ha cancellato i ricordi della loro storia damore, e decide di fare altrettanto. Ma cambiera idea.

programme.title: Finche cè Ditta cè speranza
programme.desc: La sitcom non e composta da una trama vera e propria; ogni puntata assembla vari pezzi di sketch che vedono la Premiata Ditta, celebre quartetto comico, vestire panni di mariti sottomessi, mogli autoritarie, famiglie in vacanza, nonne, medici, bambini troppo cresciuti e tanti altri personaggi in vesti stravaganti, interpretandoli con le celebri tecniche dellesasperazione del personaggio, del linguaggio e delle azioni in modo da far risaltare al meglio il lato irriverente del personaggio.

programme.title: Nonno Felice
programme.desc: Ce grande fermento in casa Malinverni. La famiglia di Nonno Felice sara infatti protagonista della prossima puntata di una trasmissione televisiva condotta da Patrizia Rossetti, trasmissione che si registra direttamente a casa delle varie famiglie italiane. Sotto locchio delle telecamere il nonno fa la parte del leone e finisce per combinare una serie di guai. Nonostante questo, pero, la mattina dopo in casa Malinverni arrivano molti telegrammi di congratulazioni.....

programme.title: Note di cinema
programme.desc: La giornalista Anna Praderio firma questa rubrica che approfondisce, con servizi e interviste ai protagonisti del cinema italiano e internazionale, gli eventi legati al mondo dello spettacolo.

programme.title: Il tenente Kojak
programme.desc: Due poliziotti finiscono nei guai quando, durante una colluttazione, uccidono un giovane di origine ispaniche.

programme.title: Walker Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Buddy, un autista di autocarri, viene derubato del suo carico da una banda di spietati rapinatori. Walker (Chuck Norris) prepara una trappola mettendo Trivette (Clarence Gilyard) alla guida di un autocarro pieno di televisori. Ma Trivette, inesperto nella guida dei camion, viene fermato dalla polizia stradale per guida pericolosa prima che i rapinatori abbiano il tempo di entrare in azione. Walker e costretto a ideare un nuovo piano; ma stavolta funzionera...

programme.title: Luomo mascherato contro i pirati
programme.desc: Un misterioso uomo mascherato combatte contro una ciurma di pirati che vogliono vendere delle donne come schiave.

programme.title: Cuori ribelli
programme.desc: Alla fine dellOttocento Joseph, figlio di un contadino irlandese e Shannon, figlia del padrone sfruttatore, per ragioni diverse, ma spinti dal medesimo impulso di ribellione, simbarcano per lAmerica verso una nuova vita.

programme.desc: La banda dei fratelli Cochran, conosciuta e temuta in tutta la citta, traffica in armi e mette a segno rapine e furti. I banditi se la cavano sempre perche le loro vittime ed i testimoni, terrorizzati dalle minacce, finiscono per tirarsi indietro. programme.title: I trecento di Fort Canby
programme.desc: In un fortino di territorio Apache, il comandante della Cavalleria cerca di allontanare il tenente McQuade da una vecchia fiamma.

programme.title: Luomo dellanno
programme.desc: Il regista premio Oscar di "Rain Man" dirige Robin Williams nei panni di un comico e presentatore di un talk show che vince le presidenziali USA.

programme.title: Christine - La macchina infernale
programme.desc: Franz, giovane sottotenente dei dragoni, e da qualche tempo lamante di una signora sposata. Con R. Schneider e A. Delon.

programme.title: Colpo rovente
programme.desc: Per indagare sulla morte di un industriale legato al crimine, il capitano di polizia Frank Berin si spaccia per biker. Con M. Reardon, B. Bouchet.

programme.title: Il tenente Kojak
programme.desc: Un portuale viene trovato morto in strada; luomo aveva cercato di proteggere la merce del porto sotto attacco dalle organizzazioni criminali.

programme.title: Walker Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Laurie e una studentessa madre di una bambina di pochi mesi, Alice. Stedler, un losco individuo a capo di unagenzia di adozioni, fa rapire la piccola Alice per darla in adozione a Garrett Carlson, uno degli uomini piu in vista della citta, che non puo avviare una legale pratica dadozione dato che sua moglie e unex alcolista. Grazie a Laurie, che riesce ad individuare la pista da seguire, Walker (Chuck Norris) e Trivette (Clarence Gilyard) riescono a smascherare Stedler oltre a incriminare Carlson come suo complice...

programme.title: Il mammasantissima
programme.desc: Sceneggiata napoletana con Mario Merola. Don Vincenzo Tramontano, contrabbandiere galantuomo, deve affrontare due nemici senza codice morale.

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: La famiglia Smith frequenta con entusiasmo il centro ricreativo della citta, che offre una vasta gamma di attivita interessanti. Jeff, ad esempio, ha imparato a costruire casette per uccelli e mette alla prova la sua abilita realizzando una vera e propria dimora di lusso nel giardino di casa, ma si ritrova poi a dover gestire degli inquilini decisamente rumorosi e prepotenti; Francine e Hayley si dedicano a un corso di macellazione; Steve, infine, suona il violoncello nellorchestra del centro, rivelando un grande talento musicale che, pero, tiene nascosto a Stan, al quale ha raccontato di essere entrato nella squadra di rugby. Roger, o meglio un suo alter ego che svolge la professione di direttore lorchestra, convince Steve a rivelare la verita a suo padre, ma durante una prova generale si verifica un inquietante episodio che portera alla luce una serie di problemi irrisolti tra padri e figli.

programme.title: Studio Aperto - La Giornata
programme.desc: I principali fatti e notizie della giornata a cura della redazione giornalistica di Studio Aperto.

programme.title: Sport Mediaset - La Giornata
programme.desc: Approfondimento quotidiano in diretta sul mondo del calcio e dello sport a cura della redazione giornalistica di Sport Mediaset.

programme.title: Camera Cafe
programme.desc: Luca Bizzarri e Paolo Kessisoglu sono i protagonisti di questa divertentissima sitcom. Le vicende degli impiegati di unazienda si intrecciano intorno alla macchinetta del caffe.

programme.title: Ingegneria Perduta
programme.desc: Una casa spettrale costruita per un brutale governatore; una colossale opera di ingegneria lasciata ad arrugginire nella foresta; torri ed edifici abbarbicati su una scogliera.

programme.title: Ingegneria Perduta
programme.desc: Un complesso monumentale ai confini della terra; unavamposto disabitato nel bel mezzo di un paesaggio polare.

programme.title: Ingegneria Perduta
programme.desc: Un impianto sotterraneo costruito al servizio di un regime malvagio; una citta fantasma che cela un tesoro nascosto.

programme.title: Fuori le prove! - indagini ai confini della realta
programme.desc: In uno speciale sugli UFO, Tony Harris analizza gli ultimi sviluppi e le prove fotografiche piu convincenti raccolte in un anno di avvistamenti. Le presunte prove presentate al Congresso degli Stati Uniti dimostrano che gli UFO sono una minaccia per la sicurezza nazionale? Si tratta di velivoli terrestri o di veri UFO? E gli Stati Uniti hanno davvero recuperato dei detriti alieni? Harris e un gruppo di ricercatori, investigatori, accademici e scienziati di alto livello valutano le ultime presunte immagini aliene raccolte e si pronunciano sulla loro autenticita.

programme.title: Hazzard
programme.desc: Un noto allevatore di cavalli viene derubato di un suo costosissimo purosangue. Inizialmente lanimale e preso da Boss e Rosco, ma poi subentrano due "veri" ladri.

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: A San Duarte il colonnello Peralta (Miguel Fernandes) organizza un colpo di stato e dichiara la legge marziale. Il Presidente Sosa (William Marquez) e Tom Harrington (Kip Niven), collaboratore della fondazione Knight a San Duarte, vengono arrestati e rinchiusi nella prigione di stato. Michael (David Hasselhoff) e il centauro RC3 (Peter Parros) si precipitano a San Duarte con lintento di liberare Tom e si ritrovano coinvolti nella lotta rivoluzionaria per ristabilire la democrazia nel paese.

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Michael Knight e incaricato di proteggere ed aiutare Karen Bennett, addetta alla produzione del remake di un vecchio film del genere thriller. La lavorazione del film e rallentata da strani e misteriosi incidenti che procurano notevoli disagi e tensioni alla troupe e, ovviamente, pesanti costi supplementari alla produzione. Michael viene a sapere che il produttore Victor Gavin e indebitato con una losca organizzazione.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Lospedale si trova a far fronte alla mancata consegna delle divise, e la Goodwin cerca di risolvere la situazione. Crockett e Charles si occupano di Renee, una paziente che soffre di psicosi, a causa degli immunosoppressori che assume per evitare il rigetto del rene che le e stato trapiantato. Renee diventa catatonica e il marito, che ha la procura decide di fargli togliere il rene per donarlo a qualcun altro. Hannah e Will soccorrono, fuori dallospedale, Maya, una ragazza incinta che dovra subire un cesareo, ma a fine operazione va in overdose nonostante non abbia mai assunto droghe. In ospedale arrivano due detenuti feriti gravemente: uno e Sean, il figlio di Archer, laltro e Deke, luomo che lha aggredito. Archer, essendo troppo coinvolto, lascia che Sean venga operato da Neil e si occupa di Deke. Sean si salva.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: In ospedale arriva un nuovo specializzando, il dottor Lieu, che insieme a Will si occupa di Lydia, una ragazza che ha bisogno di un trapianto di fegato. Consulteranno poi Crockett per un trapianto incrociato. Hannah e Nellie cercano di aiutare Gloria, una ragazza che pensa di essere stata violentata ma che, essendo stata drogata, non ricorda nulla. Ethan, Charles e Archer aiutano Buddy, un paziente senzatetto e scoprono che e stato vittima di una frode. Purtroppo e stato operato per interessi economici e non e stato curato per un cancro alla prostata che ormai e in fase terminale. La Goodwin, con laiuto di Crockett chiede un contributo economico a Jack Dayton per inserire nelle sale operatorie i macchinari per la risonanza magnetica e Dayton accetta di dare una mano.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Will e Marianne Conway, tornando da una cena, sorprendono una coppia di immigrati che sta rubando i contanti che tengono in casa. Inseguono i due ladri, mandano fuori strada il furgone con cui cercavano di scappare, poi Will li uccide. La squadra scopre che i coniugi Conway sono coinvolti in una intrigata vicenda di droga e mafia russa.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Jeremy, un giovane con precedenti penali, uccide Matt e Kay Jones con la complicita della figlia Lillie. Allapparenza il movente sarebbe il fatto che i genitori si erano opposti alla loro storia damore. La squadra, guidata da Remy Scott, scopre che tutto riporta alla clinica in cui Lillie era ricoverata per disintossicarsi, e che la clinica e a sua volta collegata alla "Chiesa dellAllenza", una specie di setta guidata da una coppia di truffatori. Secondo la profezia, Lillie, in quanto vergine, avrebbe dovuto sposare Jeremy, il prescelto per spingere gli adepti ad un suicidio di massa.
